<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 
1.03</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Bankruptcy or Receivership.</b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">As previously disclosed, on July&nbsp;15, 2015 (the 
&#147;Petition Date&#148;), Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation (the 
&#147;Company&#148;) and certain of its subsidiaries, including Giant Gas 
Gathering LLC, Sabine Bear Paw Basin LLC, Sabine East Texas Basin LLC, Sabine 
Mid-Continent Gathering LLC, Sabine Mid-Continent LLC, Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas
Finance Corporation, Sabine South Texas Gathering LLC, Sabine South Texas LLC 
and Sabine Williston Basin LLC (collectively, the &#147;Filing 
Subsidiaries&#148; and, together with the Company, the &#147;Debtors&#148;), 
filed voluntary petitions (the &#147;Bankruptcy Petitions&#148;) for 
reorganization under chapter 11 of title 11 of the United States Code (the 
&#147;Bankruptcy Code&#148;) in the United States Bankruptcy Court for the 
Southern District of New York (the &#147;Bankruptcy Court&#148;).&#160; The 
Debtors&#146; Chapter 11 cases (the &#147;Chapter 11 Cases&#148;) are being 
jointly administered under the case styled <i>In re Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas 
Corporation, et al</i>, No.&nbsp;15-11835.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">On July&nbsp;27, 2016, the Bankruptcy Court entered 
the <i>Findings of Fact, Conclusions of Law, and Order Confirming Debtors&#146; 
Second Amended Joint Chapter 11 Plan of Reorganization</i> (the 
&#147;Confirmation Order&#148;), which approved and confirmed the Second Amended
Joint Chapter 11 Plan of Reorganization of Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation
and its Debtor Affiliates (the &#147;Plan&#148;), as modified in part by the 
Confirmation Order.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Debtors expect that the effective date of the Plan
(the &#147;Effective Date&#148;) will occur as soon as all conditions precedent 
to the Plan have been satisfied.&#160; Although the Debtors anticipate that all 
conditions that the Debtors must satisfy before or on the Effective Date will be
satisfied as of such date, the Debtors can make no assurances as to when, or 
ultimately if, the Plan will become effective.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following is a summary of the material terms of 
the Plan. This summary highlights only certain substantive provisions of the
Plan and is not intended to be a complete description of the Plan. This summary 
is qualified in its entirety by reference to the full text of the Plan and the 
Confirmation Order, which are attached hereto as Exhibits 2.1 and 99.1, 
respectively, and incorporated by reference herein.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">The Plan of Reorganization and 
Treatment of Claims and Interests</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Plan contemplates a restructuring of the Debtors 
through a debt-for-debt exchange, a debt-to-equity conversion and the issuance 
of warrants to purchase stock in the reorganized Debtors.&#160; In addition, the
Plan incorporates an integrated compromise and settlement of claims to achieve a
beneficial and efficient resolution of the Chapter 11 Cases.&#160; The 
settlement, distributions, and other benefits provided under the Plan, including
the releases and exculpation provisions included therein, are in full 
satisfaction of all claims and causes of action that could be asserted.&#160; As
part of the settlement, holders of claims under the Company&#146;s prepetition 
revolving credit facility are permitting distributions of stock and warrants to 
be made to holders of other claims.&#160; Additional information regarding the 
classification and treatment of claims and interests can be found in Articles II
and III of the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Capital Structure</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Pursuant to the terms of the Plan, all the 
Company&#146;s existing equity interests, consisting of authorized and 
outstanding shares of common stock of the Company, will be deemed automatically 
cancelled without further action upon the Effective Date. As of June&nbsp;30, 
2016 there were 202,859,849 shares of the Company&#146;s common stock 
outstanding. Under the Plan, the Company&#146;s new Certificate of Incorporation
(the &#147;New Charter&#148;) and new Bylaws will become effective on the 
Effective Date.&#160; The New Charter will authorize the Company to issue shares
of New Common Stock, certain of which will be issued to holders of allowed 
claims pursuant to the Plan on the Effective Date.&#160; Pursuant to the Plan, 
each share of the Company&#146;s New Common Stock issued upon the Effective Date
will be exchanged for a share of common stock of Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas 
Holdings,&nbsp;Inc. (&#147;Sabine HoldCo&#148;), and each warrant issued by the 
Company will be exchanged for a warrant for Sabine HoldCo&#146;s common 
stock.&#160; Pursuant to a corporate reorganization contemplated by the Plan, 
Sabine will become a wholly-owned subsidiary of HoldCo.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">2<a name="PB_2_003916_9171"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\dschwar\16-16038-1\task8049439\16038-1-
ba.htm',USER='dschwar',CD='Aug  3 15:17 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Releases</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Plan provides certain release provisions that 
include releases for the benefit of the Debtors, certain of the claimholders and
all of the foregoing parties&#146; and their affiliates&#146; current and former
equity holders (regardless of whether such interests are held directly or 
indirectly), predecessors, successors, and assigns, subsidiaries, and their 
current and former officers, directors, managers, principals, members, 
employees, agents, advisory board members, financial advisors, partners, 
attorneys, accountants, investment bankers, consultants, representatives, and 
other professionals, each in their capacity as such, as further set forth in 
Article&nbsp;VIII of the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exculpation</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Plan provides certain exculpation provisions, 
which include a full exculpation from liability in favor of the Debtors, certain
of the claimholders and all of the foregoing parties&#146; respective current 
and former affiliates, officers, directors, managers, principals, members, 
employees, agents, financial advisors, attorneys, accountants, investment 
bankers, consultants, representatives, and other professionals, each in their 
capacity as such, from various claims and causes of action, as further set forth
in Article&nbsp;VIII.H of the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Certain Information Regarding Assets 
and Liabilities of the Company</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Information regarding the assets and 
liabilities of the Company as of the most recent practicable date is hereby 
i</font>ncorporated by reference to the Company&#146;s Annual Report on 
Form&nbsp;10-K for the fiscal year ended December&nbsp;31, 2015, filed with the 
Securities and Exchange Commission on March&nbsp;24, 2016.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5pt;"><b><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Item 
9.01</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160;&#160; </font><b>Financial Statements and Exhibits.</b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">The exhibit listed in the following Exhibit&nbsp;Index
is filed as part of this Current Report on Form&nbsp;8-K.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Debtors
in these chapter&nbsp;11 cases, along with the last four digits of each 
Debtor&#146;s federal tax identification number, include:&#160; Sabine 
Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation (4900); Giant Gas Gathering LLC (3438); Sabine 
Bear Paw Basin LLC (2656); Sabine East Texas Basin LLC (8931); Sabine Mid-
Continent Gathering LLC (6085); Sabine Mid-Continent LLC (6939); Sabine 
Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Finance Corporation (2567); Sabine South Texas Gathering LLC 
(1749); Sabine South Texas LLC (5616); and Sabine Williston Basin LLC 
(4440).&#160; The location of Debtor Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas 
Corporation&#146;s corporate headquarters and the Debtors&#146; service address 
is:&#160; 1415 Louisiana, Suite&nbsp;1600, Houston, Texas 77002.</p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-
collapse:collapse;">
<tr>
<td width="90%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 
0in;width:90.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Article&nbsp;XI. RETENTION OF   
JURISDICTION</font></b></p>    </td>
<td width="10%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:10.0%;">
<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><b><font
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">52</font></b></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="90%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='iii',FILE='C:\JMS\108224\16-16038-1\task8047710\16038-1-ki-
03.htm',USER='108224',CD='Aug  3 11:47 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><u><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">INTRODUCTION</font></u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation 
(&#147;<u>Sabine</u>&#148;) and its debtor affiliates, as debtors and debtors in
possession (each, a &#147;<u>Debtor</u>&#148; and, collectively, the 
&#147;<u>Debtors</u>&#148;) propose this amended joint plan of reorganization 
(together with the documents comprising the Plan Supplement, the 
&#147;<u>Plan</u>&#148;) for the resolution of outstanding Claims against, and 
Interests in, the Debtors.&#160; Capitalized terms used in the Plan and not 
otherwise defined shall have the meanings ascribed to such terms in 
Article&nbsp;I.A hereof.&#160; Holders of Claims and Interests may refer to the 
Disclosure Statement for a discussion of the Debtors&#146; history, businesses, 
assets, results of operations, historical financial information, and projections
of future operations, as well as a summary and description of the Plan.&#160; 
The Debtors are the proponents of the Plan within the meaning of 
section&nbsp;1129 of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ALL HOLDERS OF CLAIMS AND INTERESTS, TO THE
EXTENT APPLICABLE, ARE ENCOURAGED TO READ THE PLAN AND THE DISCLOSURE STATEMENT 
IN THEIR ENTIRETY BEFORE VOTING TO ACCEPT OR REJECT THE PLAN.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;I.<br> DEFINED TERMS, RULES OF INTERPRETATION,<br> 
COMPUTATION OF TIME, AND GOVERNING LAW</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">A.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Defined Terms</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As used in the Plan, capitalized terms have
the meanings set forth below.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; &#147;<i>2017 Senior Notes</i>&#148; means the 9.75 percent senior 
notes due 2017 pursuant to the 2017 Senior Notes Indenture (as amended, 
modified, waived, or supplemented from time to time and with all supplements and
exhibits thereto), outstanding in the amount of $364,123,958.33 as of the 
Petition Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; &#147;<i>2019 Senior Notes</i>&#148; means the 7.25 percent senior 
notes due 2019 pursuant to the 2019 Senior Notes Indenture (as amended, 
modified, waived, or supplemented from time to time and with all supplements and
exhibits thereto), outstanding in the amount of $602,238,560.79 as of the 
Petition Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; &#147;<i>2020 Senior Notes</i>&#148; means the 7.50 percent senior 
notes due 2020 pursuant to the 2020 Senior Notes Indenture (as amended, 
modified, waived, or supplemented from time to time and with all supplements and
exhibits thereto), outstanding in the amount of $227,592,906.88 as of the 
Petition Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; &#147;<i>2017 Senior Notes Claims</i>&#148; means all Claims against 
any Debtor arising from or based upon the 2017 Senior Notes or the 2017 Senior 
Notes Indenture, including accrued unpaid prepetition interest, costs, fees, and
indemnities).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; &#147;<i>2019 Senior Notes Claims</i>&#148; means all Claims against 
any Debtor arising from or based upon the 2019 Senior Notes or the 2019 Senior 
Notes Indenture, including accrued unpaid prepetition interest, costs, fees, and
indemnities).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; &#147;<i>2020 Senior Notes Claims</i>&#148; means all Claims against 
any Debtor arising from or based upon the 2020 Senior Notes or the 2020 Senior 
Notes Indenture, including accrued unpaid prepetition interest, costs, fees, and
indemnities).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; &#147;<i>2017 Senior Notes Indenture</i>&#148; means that certain 
Indenture, dated as of February&nbsp;12, 2010, between Sabine and the 2017 
Senior Notes Indenture Trustee (together with any predecessors, successors or 
assigns and other parties from time to time thereto), providing for the issuance
of the 2017 Senior Notes (as amended, modified, waived, or supplemented from 
time to time and with all supplements and exhibits thereto).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; &#147;<i>2019 Senior Notes Indenture</i>&#148; means that certain 
Indenture, dated as of June&nbsp;6, 2007, between Sabine and the 2019 Senior 
Notes Indenture Trustee (together with any predecessors, successors or assigns 
and other</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">1<a name="PB_1_114815_7906"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">parties from time to time thereto), providing for the 
issuance of the 2019 Senior Notes (as amended, modified, waived, or supplemented
from time to time and with all supplements and exhibits thereto).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; &#147;<i>2020 Senior Notes Indenture</i>&#148; means that certain 
Indenture, dated as of September&nbsp;17, 2012, between Sabine and the 2020 
Senior Notes Indenture Trustee (together with any predecessors, successors or 
assigns and other parties from time to time thereto), providing for the issuance
of the 2020 Senior Notes (as amended, modified, waived, or supplemented from 
time to time and with all supplements and exhibits thereto).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">10.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>2017 Senior Notes Indenture Trustee</i>&#148; means The Bank of New 
York Mellon Trust Company, N.A., (together with any predecessors, successors or 
assigns), solely in its capacity as indenture trustee under the 2017 Senior 
Notes Indenture.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">11.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>2019 Senior Notes Indenture Trustee</i>&#148; means Wilmington Savings 
Fund Society, FSB, (together with any predecessors, successors or assigns), 
solely in its capacity as indenture trustee under the 2019 Senior Notes 
Indenture.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">12.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>2020 Senior Notes Indenture Trustee</i>&#148; means Delaware Trust 
Company, (together with any predecessors, successors or assigns), solely in its 
capacity as indenture trustee under the 2020 Senior Notes Indenture.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">13.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Accrued Professional Compensation Claims</i>&#148; means Claims for all
accrued, contingent or unpaid fees and expenses (including success fees) for 
legal, financial advisory, accounting, and other services and reimbursement of 
expenses of Committee and Estate Professionals that are awardable and allowable 
under sections&nbsp;328, 330, or 331 of the Bankruptcy Code or otherwise Allowed
before the Effective Date, (a)&nbsp;all to the extent that any such fees and 
expenses have not been previously paid (regardless of whether a fee application 
has been Filed for any such amount) and (b)&nbsp;after applying any retainer 
that has been provided to such Professional.&#160; To the extent that the Court 
or any higher court of competent jurisdiction denies or reduces by a Final Order
any amount of a Professional&#146;s fees or expenses, then those reduced or 
denied amounts shall no longer constitute Accrued Professional 
Compensation.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">14.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Adequate Protection Claims</i>&#148; has the meaning assigned to such 
term in the Cash Collateral Order.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">15.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>&#147;Adequate Protection Liens</i>&#148; has the meaning assigned to 
such term in the Cash Collateral Order.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">16.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Administrative Claim</i>&#148; means a Claim for costs and expenses of 
administration of the Debtors&#146; Estates pursuant to sections&nbsp;503(b), 
507(a)(2), 507(b), or 1114(e)(2)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code, including:&#160; 
(a)&nbsp;the actual and necessary costs and expenses incurred after the Petition
Date and through the Effective Date of preserving the Estates and operating the 
businesses of the Debtors; (b)&nbsp;Allowed Accrued Professional Compensation 
Claims; and (c)&nbsp;any Allowed requests for compensation or expense 
reimbursement for making a substantial contribution in the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases
pursuant to sections&nbsp;503(b)(3), (4), and (5)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy 
Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">17.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Administrative Claims Bar Date</i>&#148; means the first Business Day 
that is 30 days following the Effective Date, except as specifically set forth 
in the Plan or a Final Order</font>, which shall serve as the deadline for 
filing and service of a request for payment of an Administrative Claim, other 
than a Claim arising under section 503(b)(9)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code as 
provided under the Claims Bar Date Order.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">18.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Adversary Proceeding</i>&#148; means that proceeding before the Court 
numbered 15-01126, as initiated by the <i>Complaint Against Wilmington Trust, 
N.A. </i>[Adv. Proc., Docket No.&nbsp;1].</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">19.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Affiliate</i>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in 
section&nbsp;101(2)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">20.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Allowed</i>&#148; means with respect to any Claim, except as otherwise 
provided herein: (a)&nbsp;a Claim that is evidenced by a Proof of Claim Filed by
the Claims Bar Date (or for which Claim under the Plan, the Bankruptcy Code, or 
a Final Order of the Court a Proof of Claim is not or shall not be required to 
be Filed); (b)&nbsp;a Claim that is</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">2<a name="PB_2_114827_3736"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\108224\16-16038-1\task8047710\16038-1-ki-
05.htm',USER='108224',CD='Aug  3 11:50 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">listed in the Schedules as not contingent, not 
unliquidated, and not disputed, and for which no Proof of Claim, as applicable, 
has been timely Filed; or (c)&nbsp;a Claim Allowed pursuant to the Plan or a 
Final Order of the Court; <i>provided</i> that with respect to a Claim described
in clauses&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;and (b)&nbsp;above, such Claim shall be considered 
Allowed only if and to the extent that with respect to such Claim no objection 
to the allowance thereof has been interposed within the applicable period of 
time fixed by the Plan, the Bankruptcy Code, the Bankruptcy Rules, or the Court,
or such an objection is so interposed and the Claim, as applicable, shall have 
been Allowed by a Final Order.&#160; Any Claim that has been or is hereafter 
listed in the Schedules as contingent, unliquidated, or disputed, and for which 
no Proof of Claim is or has been timely Filed, is not considered Allowed and 
shall be expunged without further action by the Debtors and without further 
notice to any party or action, approval, or order of the Court.&#160;
Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, no Claim of any Entity subject 
to section 502(d)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code shall be deemed Allowed unless and
until such Entity pays in full the amount that it owes such Debtor or 
Reorganized Debtor, as applicable.&#160; For the avoidance of doubt, a Proof of 
Claim Filed after the Claims Bar Date shall not be Allowed for any purposes 
whatsoever absent entry of a Final Order allowing such late-filed Claim.&#160; 
&#147;Allow&#148; and &#147;Allowing&#148; shall have correlative 
meanings.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">21.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Approved Broker-Dealer</i>&#148; means any of Goldman, Sachs&nbsp;&amp;
Co.; Morgan Stanley&nbsp;&amp; Co., LLC; or Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC, 
as selected in good faith by the then existing board of directors of New Holdco 
at the time of the applicable &#147;Change of Control&#148; or sale transaction 
set forth in Article&nbsp;IV.B.1.b(ii)&nbsp;or (iii), which broker-dealer 
(a)&nbsp;does not, and whose directors, officers, employees or affiliates do 
not, have a material financial interest for its proprietary account in New 
Holdco or any of the Reorganized Debtors; (b)&nbsp;has not been engaged as an 
advisor by New Holdco or any of the Reorganized Debtors during the twelve months
prior to the date of the applicable Change of Control or sale transaction; and 
(c)&nbsp;in the judgment of the then existing board of directors of New Holdco, 
is otherwise independent with respect to New Holdco, the Reorganized Debtors and
the holders of Warrants.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">22.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Avoidance Actions</i>&#148; means any and all actual or potential 
Claims and Causes of Action to avoid a transfer of property or an obligation 
incurred by the Debtors arising under chapter&nbsp;5 of the Bankruptcy Code, 
including sections&nbsp;544, 545, 547, 548, 549, 550, 551, and 553(b)&nbsp;of 
the Bankruptcy Code; <i>provided</i> that Avoidance Actions do not include 
Released Claims or Settled Claims.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">23.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Ballot</i>&#148; means the ballots accompanying the Disclosure 
Statement upon which certain Holders of Impaired Claims entitled to vote shall, 
among other things, indicate their acceptance or rejection of the Plan in 
accordance with the Plan and the procedures governing the solicitation process, 
and which must be actually received by the Notice and Claims Agent on or before 
the Voting Deadline.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">24.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Bankruptcy Code</i>&#148; means title 11 of the United States Code, as 
amended and in effect during the pendency of the Chapter&nbsp;11 
Cases.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">25.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Bankruptcy Rules</i>&#148; means the Federal Rules&nbsp;of Bankruptcy 
Procedure, as applicable to the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases, promulgated under 
section&nbsp;2075 of the Judicial Code and the general, local, and chambers
rules&nbsp;of the Court.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">26.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Barclays</i>&#148; means Barclays Bank PLC, in its capacity as an RBL 
Lender.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">27.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Black-Scholes Method</i>&#148; shall mean the standard Black-Scholes 
options pricing model as determined by the Approved Broker-Dealer in good faith 
in accordance with its customary practices for calculating the value of 
warrants; <i>provided</i> that certain of the Black-Scholes inputs shall be 
determined as follows: (a)&nbsp;the risk free rate input shall reflect the 
annual yield of the then prevailing U.S. Treasury Note to the date closest to 
the expiry of the Warrants; (b)&nbsp;the &#147;term&#148; input shall be the 
time in years (without rounding) remaining until the scheduled expiration of the
Warrants; and (c)&nbsp;the underlying price of the New Common Stock in New 
Holdco shall be the price implied by the applicable &#147;Change of 
Control&#148; or sale transaction set forth in Article&nbsp;IV.B.1.b(ii)&nbsp;or
(iii).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">28.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Business Day</i>&#148; means any day other than a Saturday, Sunday, or 
&#147;legal holiday&#148; (as defined in Bankruptcy 
Rule&nbsp;9006(a)).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">3<a name="PB_3_114837_9621"></a></p>

align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">29.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Cash</i>&#148; means the legal tender of the United States of America 
or the equivalent thereof.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">30.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Cash Collateral Order</i>&#148; means the <i>Final Order Pursuant to 11
U.S.C. &#167;&#167;105, 361, 362, 363 and 507, Bankruptcy Rules&nbsp;2002, 4001 
and 9014 and Local Bankruptcy Rule&nbsp;4001-2 (I)&nbsp;Authorizing 
Debtors&#146; Limited Use of Cash Collateral, (II)&nbsp;Granting Adequate 
Protection to the Prepetition Secured Parties and (III)&nbsp;Modifying the 
Automatic Stay,</i> entered by the Court on September&nbsp;16, 2015 [Docket 
No.&nbsp;339], as subsequently extended by notice on December&nbsp;28, 2015
[Docket No.&nbsp;658], by bridge order on February&nbsp;16, 2016 [Docket 
No.&nbsp;820], by bridge order on March&nbsp;15, 2016 [Docket No.&nbsp;883], and
by order on April&nbsp;7, 2016 [Docket No.&nbsp;958], as the same may be 
amended, modified or extended from time to time, authorizing the Debtors to use 
cash collateral and granting adequate protection to the RBL Agent, the RBL 
Lenders, the Second Lien Agent, and the Second Lien Lenders.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">31.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Causes of Action</i>&#148; means any action, Claim, cause of action, 
controversy, demand, right, action, Lien, indemnity, guaranty, suit, obligation,
liability, damage, judgment, account, defense, offset, power, privilege, 
license, and franchise of any kind or character whatsoever, whether known, 
unknown, contingent or non-contingent, matured or unmatured, suspected or 
unsuspected, liquidated or unliquidated, disputed or undisputed, secured or 
unsecured, assertable directly or derivatively, whether arising before, on, or 
after the Petition Date, in contract or in tort, in law, or in equity or 
pursuant to any other theory of law.&#160; For the avoidance of doubt, 
&#147;Cause of Action&#148; includes: (a)&nbsp;any right of setoff, 
counterclaim, or recoupment and any Claim for breach of contract or for breach 
of duties imposed by law or in equity; (b)&nbsp;the right to object to Claims or
Interests; (c)&nbsp;any Claim pursuant to section&nbsp;362 or chapter&nbsp;5 of 
the Bankruptcy Code (including Avoidance Actions); (d)&nbsp;any Claim or defense
including fraud, mistake, duress, and usury; and any other defenses set forth in
section&nbsp;558 of the Bankruptcy Code; and (e)&nbsp;any state or foreign law 
fraudulent transfer or similar Claim.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">32.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases</i>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;when used with reference
to a particular Debtor, the case pending for that Debtor under chapter&nbsp;11 
of the Bankruptcy Code in the Court and (b)&nbsp;when used with reference to all
of the Debtors, the procedurally consolidated and jointly administered 
chapter&nbsp;11 cases pending for the Debtors in the Court.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">33.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Claim</i>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in 
section&nbsp;101(5)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">34.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Claims Bar Date</i>&#148; means the date by which a Proof of Claim must
be or must have been Filed, as established by (a)&nbsp;the Claims Bar Date 
Order, or (b)&nbsp;any other Final Order of the Court, as applicable.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">35.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Claims Bar Date Order</i>&#148; means that certain order entered by the
Court on November&nbsp;10, 2015 [Docket No.&nbsp;502], establishing the Claims 
Bar Dates.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">36.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Claims Objection Deadline</i>&#148; means the deadline for objecting to
a Claim, which shall be on the date that is the later of (a)&nbsp;180 days after
the Effective Date and (b)&nbsp;such other period of limitation as may be 
specifically fixed by the Debtors or the Reorganized Debtors, as applicable, or 
by an order of the Court for objecting to such Claims.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">37.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Claims Register</i>&#148; means the official register of Claims 
maintained by the Notice and Claims Agent.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">38.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Class</i>&#148; means a category of Holders of Claims or Interests as 
set forth in Article&nbsp;III hereof pursuant to section&nbsp;1122(a)&nbsp;of 
the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">39.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Combination</i>&#148; means the combination of Forest Oil and Old 
Sabine first announced in May&nbsp;2014 and consummated in 
December&nbsp;2014.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">40.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Committee</i>&#148; means the official committee of unsecured creditors
appointed in the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases pursuant to section&nbsp;1102(a)&nbsp;of 
the Bankruptcy Code on July&nbsp;28, 2015 [Docket No.&nbsp;90], as subsequently 
reconstituted on November&nbsp;10, 2015 [Docket No.&nbsp;499].</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">4<a name="PB_4_114850_8715"></a></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\JMS\108224\16-16038-1\task8047710\16038-1-ki-
05.htm',USER='108224',CD='Aug  3 11:50 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">41.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Committee Members</i>&#148; means each of the following, in each case 
solely in its capacity as a member of the Committee:&#160; (a)&nbsp;The Bank of 
New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A.; (b)&nbsp;Aurelius Capital Partners, LP; 
(c)&nbsp;AQR Diversified Arbitrage Fund; (d)&nbsp;Asset Risk Management, LLC; 
and (e)&nbsp;Wilmington Savings Fund Society, FSB.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">42.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Confirmation</i>&#148; means the entry of the Confirmation Order on the
docket of the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">43.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Confirmation Date</i>&#148; means the date upon which the Court enters 
the Confirmation Order on the docket of the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases, within the 
meaning of Bankruptcy Rules&nbsp;5003 and 9021.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">44.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Confirmation Hearing</i>&#148; means the hearing held by the Court to 
consider Confirmation of the Plan pursuant to section&nbsp;1129 of the 
Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">45.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Confirmation Order</i>&#148; means an order of the Court confirming the
Plan pursuant to section&nbsp;1129 of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">46.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Consummation</i>&#148; means the occurrence of the Effective 
Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">47.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Convenience Claims</i>&#148; means all Allowed General Unsecured Claims
against any Debtor in an Allowed amount that is greater than $0 but less than or
equal to $500,000; <i>provided</i> that a Holder of a General Unsecured Claim in
an Allowed amount greater than $500,000 may elect to have such Claim irrevocably
reduced to $500,000 and treated as a Convenience Claim for purposes of the Plan 
in full and final satisfaction of such Claim.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">48.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Court</i>&#148; means the United States Bankruptcy Court for the 
Southern District of New York having jurisdiction over the Chapter&nbsp;11 
Cases, and, to the extent of the withdrawal of any reference under 28 U.S.C. 
&#167;&nbsp;157 or the General Order of the District Court pursuant to 
section&nbsp;151 of title 28 of the United States Code, the United States 
District Court for the Southern District of New York.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">49.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Cure Claim</i>&#148; means a monetary Claim based upon the 
Debtors&#146; defaults under any Executory Contract or Unexpired Lease at the 
time such contract or lease is assumed by the Debtors pursuant to
section&nbsp;365 of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">50.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Cure Notice</i>&#148; means a notice of a proposed amount to be paid on
account of a Cure Claim in connection with an Executory Contract or Unexpired 
Lease to be assumed under the Plan pursuant to section&nbsp;365 of the 
Bankruptcy Code, which notice shall include (a)&nbsp;procedures for objecting to
proposed assumptions of Executory Contracts and Unexpired Leases; (b)&nbsp;Cure 
Claims to be paid in connection therewith; and (c)&nbsp;procedures for 
resolution by the Court of any related disputes.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">51.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>D&amp;O Liability Insurance Policies</i>&#148; means all insurance 
policies (including any &#147;tail policy&#148;) of any of the Debtors for 
current or former directors&#146;, managers&#146;, and officers&#146; 
liability.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">52.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Debtors</i>&#148; means, collectively:&#160; (a)&nbsp;Sabine 
Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation; (b)&nbsp;Giant Gas Gathering LLC; 
(c)&nbsp;Sabine Bear Paw Basin LLC; (d)&nbsp;Sabine East Texas Basin LLC; 
(e)&nbsp;Sabine Mid-Continent Gathering LLC; (f)&nbsp;Sabine Mid-Continent LLC; 
(g)&nbsp;Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Finance Corp.; (h)&nbsp;Sabine South Texas 
Gathering LLC; (i)&nbsp;Sabine South Texas LLC; and (j)&nbsp;Sabine Williston 
Basin LLC, each as a debtor and debtor-in-possession in these Chapter&nbsp;11 
Cases.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">53.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Debtor Subsidiaries</i>&#148; means, collectively, each Debtor other 
than Sabine.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">54.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Disallowed</i>&#148; means, with respect to any Claim, a Claim or any 
portion thereof that (a)&nbsp;has been disallowed by a Final Order, (b)&nbsp;is 
Scheduled as zero or as contingent, disputed, or unliquidated and as to which no
Proof of Claim or request for payment of an Administrative Claim has been timely
filed or deemed timely filed with the Court pursuant to either the Bankruptcy 
Code or any Final Order of the Court or otherwise deemed timely filed under 
applicable law or this Plan, (c)&nbsp;is not Scheduled and as to which no Proof 
of Claim or request for payment of an Administrative Claim has been timely filed
or deemed timely filed with the Court pursuant to either the</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">5<a name="PB_5_114902_563"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Bankruptcy Code or any Final Order of the Court or 
otherwise deemed timely filed under applicable law or this Plan, (d)&nbsp;has 
been withdrawn by agreement of the applicable Debtor and the Holder thereof, or 
(e)&nbsp;has been withdrawn by the Holder thereof.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">55.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Disclosure Statement</i>&#148; means the <i>Disclosure Statement for 
the Second Amended Joint Chapter&nbsp;11 Plan of Reorganization of Sabine 
Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation and its Debtor Affiliates</i> [Docket 
No.&nbsp;1061, Ex. B], as may be further amended from time to time, including 
all exhibits and schedules thereto and references therein that relate to the 
Plan, that is prepared and distributed in accordance with the Bankruptcy Code, 
the Bankruptcy Rules, and any other applicable law.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">56.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Disputed</i>&#148; means a Claim that is in dispute or is otherwise not
yet Allowed.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">57.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Disputed Claim Amount</i>&#148;&#160; means (a)&nbsp;if a liquidated 
amount is set forth in the Proof of Claim relating to a Disputed Claim:&#160; 
(i)&nbsp;the liquidated amount set forth in the Proof of Claim relating to the 
Disputed Claim, (ii)&nbsp;an amount agreed to by the Debtors or the Reorganized 
Debtors, as applicable, with the consent of the RBL Agent, which consent shall 
not be unreasonably withheld, and the Holder of such Disputed Claim, or 
(iii)&nbsp;if a request for estimation is Filed by any party, the amount at 
which such Disputed Claim is estimated by the Court; (b)&nbsp;if no liquidated 
amount is set forth in the Proof of Claim relating to a Disputed Claim:&#160; 
(i)&nbsp;an amount agreed to by the Debtors or the Reorganized Debtors, as 
applicable, with the consent of the RBL Agent, which consent shall not be 
unreasonably withheld, and the Holder of such Disputed Claim, (ii)&nbsp;the 
amount estimated by the Court with respect to such Disputed Claim, or 
(iii)&nbsp;the amount estimated with respect to the Disputed Claim in good faith
by the Debtors or Reorganized Debtors, as applicable, with the consent of the 
RBL Agent, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld; or (c)&nbsp;zero, 
if the Disputed Claim was listed on the Schedules as unliquidated, contingent, 
or disputed and no Proof of Claim was Filed, or deemed to have been Filed, by 
the applicable Claims Bar Date and the Claim has not been resolved by written 
agreement of the parties or an order of the Court.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">58.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Distribution Record Date</i>&#148; means the date for determining which
Holders of Claims or Interests are eligible to receive distributions hereunder, 
which date shall be (a)&nbsp;the Effective Date or (b)&nbsp;such other date as 
designated in a Court Order; <i>provided </i>that the Distribution Record Date
shall not apply to publicly held securities.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">59.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>DTC</i>&#148; means the Depository Trust Company.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">60.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Effective Date</i>&#148; means, with respect to the Plan, the date that
is a Business Day selected by the Debtors subject to the consent of the RBL 
Agent, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld, on which:&#160; 
(a)&nbsp;no stay of the Confirmation Order is in effect; (b)&nbsp;all conditions
precedent specified in Article&nbsp;IX.A and IX.B have been satisfied (or waived
in accordance with Article&nbsp;IX.C); and (c)&nbsp;the Plan is declared 
effective.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">61.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Entity</i>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in 
section&nbsp;101(15) of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">62.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Estate</i>&#148; means, as to each Debtor, the estate created for the 
Debtor in its Chapter&nbsp;11 Case pursuant to section&nbsp;541 of the 
Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">63.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Exculpation</i>&#148; means the exculpation set forth in 
Article&nbsp;VIII of the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">64.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Exculpated Claim</i>&#148; means any Released Claim, Settled Claim, 
Cause of Action or any Claim related to any act or omission derived from, based 
upon, related to, or arising from the Debtors&#146; in or out-of-court 
restructuring efforts, the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases, the marketing process, 
formulation, preparation, dissemination, negotiation, or Filing of the 
Disclosure Statement, the Plan, or any contract, instrument, release or other 
agreement or document (including, for the avoidance of doubt, providing any 
legal opinion requested by any Entity regarding any transaction, contract, 
instrument, document, or other agreement contemplated by the Plan or the 
reliance by any Exculpated Party on the Plan or the Confirmation Order in lieu 
of such legal opinion) created or entered into in connection with any of the 
foregoing, including: (a)&nbsp;the issuance of the New Common Stock and 
Warrants; (b)&nbsp;the execution, delivery, and performance of the Exit Revolver
Credit Facility Documents, the New Second Lien Credit Facility Documents, the 
New Organizational Documents, the Management Incentive Plan, the Restructuring 
Transactions, the Stockholders&#146; Agreement, the Registration Rights 
Agreement, or the Warrant Agreements; and (c)</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">6<a name="PB_6_114914_9497"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
