<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">the distribution of property under the Plan or any 
other agreement under the Plan; <i>provided</i> that the Exculpated Parties 
shall be entitled, in all respects, to reasonably rely upon the advice of 
counsel with respect to the foregoing; <i>provided further</i> that the 
foregoing shall not be deemed to release, affect, or limit any of the rights and
obligations of the Exculpated Parties from, or exculpate the Exculpated Parties 
with respect to, any of the Exculpated Parties&#146; obligations or covenants 
arising under the Confirmation Order, the Plan, the Exit Revolver Credit 
Facility Documents, the New Second Lien Credit Facility Documents, the 
Stockholders&#146; Agreement, the Registration Rights Agreement, the Warrant 
Agreements, and any contracts, instruments, releases, and other agreements or 
documents delivered in connection with, or contemplated by, the 
foregoing.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">65.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Exculpated Parties</i>&#148; means each of: (a)&nbsp;the Debtors; 
(b)&nbsp;the Reorganized Debtors; (c)&nbsp;the Committee and Committee Members; 
(d)&nbsp;the RBL Agent; (e)&nbsp;the RBL Lenders; (f)&nbsp;the Exit Revolver 
Agent; (g)&nbsp;the New Second Lien Agent; (h)&nbsp;the Second Lien Agent; 
(i)&nbsp;the Second Lien Lenders; (j)&nbsp;the DTC; and (k)&nbsp;with respect to
each of the foregoing Entities in clauses&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;through (i), such 
Entity&#146;s current and former affiliates, officers, directors, managers, 
principals, members, employees, agents, financial advisors, attorneys, 
accountants, investment bankers, consultants, representatives, and other 
professionals, each in their capacity as such.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">66.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Executory Contract</i>&#148; means a contract to which one or more of 
the Debtors is a party that is subject to assumption or rejection under 
sections&nbsp;365 or 1123 of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">67.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>&#147;<i>Exit Revolver Agent</i></font>&#148; means Wells Fargo Bank, 
N.A., in its capacities as the administrative agent and collateral agent under 
the Exit Revolver Credit Facility Agreement and the other Exit Revolver Credit 
Facility Documents.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">68.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
&#147;<i>Exit Revolver Credit Facility</i>&#148; means the first priority 
revolving credit facility made available to the Reorganized Debtors on and after
the Effective Date pursuant to the Exit Revolver Credit Facility 
Agreement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">69.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Exit Revolver Credit Facility Agreement</i>&#148; means that certain 
credit agreement (a substantially final form of which shall be included in the 
Plan Supplement) to be entered into on the Effective Date by and among New 
Holdco, Reorganized Sabine, as borrower, the Exit Revolver Agent, the RBL 
Lenders, as lenders thereunder, and the other parties thereto, which shall be in
form and substance satisfactory to the Debtors and the RBL Agent.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">70.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Exit Revolver Credit Facility Documents</i>&#148; means, collectively, 
the Exit Revolver Credit Facility Agreement and all related amendments, 
supplements, ancillary agreements, notes, pledges, collateral agreements, 
mortgages, deeds of trust, and other documents or instruments to be executed or 
delivered in connection with the Exit Revolver Credit Facility, which shall be 
in form and substance satisfactory to the Debtors and the RBL Agent </font>and 
consistent with the terms set forth in Article&nbsp;IV.B.2 herein.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">71.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Federal Judgment Rate</i>&#148; means the federal judgment rate in 
effect as of the Petition Date, compounded annually.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">72.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>File</i>,&#148; &#147;<i>Filed</i>,&#148; or &#147;<i>Filing</i>&#148; 
means file, filed, or filing in the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases with the Court or, 
with respect to the filing or submission of a Proof of Claim or proof of 
Interest, the Notice and Claims Agent.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">73.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Final Order</i>&#148; means an order or judgment of the Court (or any 
other court of competent jurisdiction) entered by the Clerk of the Court (or any
other court) on the docket in the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases (or the docket of such 
other court), which has not been reversed, stayed, modified, amended, or 
vacated, and as to which (a)&nbsp;the time to appeal, petition for certiorari, 
or move for a new trial, stay, reargument, or rehearing has expired and as to 
which no appeal, petition for certiorari, or motion for new trial, stay, 
reargument, or rehearing shall be pending or (b)&nbsp;if an appeal, writ of 
certiorari, new trial, stay, reargument, or rehearing thereof has been sought, 
such order or judgment of the Court (or other court of competent jurisdiction) 
shall have been affirmed by the highest court to which such order was appealed, 
or certiorari shall have been denied, or a new trial, stay, reargument, or 
rehearing shall have been denied or resulted in no modification of such order, 
and the time to take any further appeal, petition for certiorari, or move for a 
new trial, stay, reargument, or rehearing shall have expired, as a result of 
which such order shall have become final in accordance with rule&nbsp;8002 of
the Bankruptcy Rules; <i>provided</i> that the possibility</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">7<a name="PB_7_114925_3641"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='7',FILE='C:\JMS\108224\16-16038-1\task8047710\16038-1-ki-
05.htm',USER='108224',CD='Aug  3 11:50 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">that a motion under rule&nbsp;60 of the Federal 
Rules&nbsp;of Civil Procedure, or any analogous rule&nbsp;under the Bankruptcy 
Rules, may be filed relating to such order, shall not cause an order not to be a
Final Order.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">74.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Forest Oil</i>&#148; means that entity Forest Oil Corporation in 
existence prior to the Combination.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">75.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>General Unsecured Claim</i>&#148; means any Claim against any Debtor 
that is not otherwise paid in full during the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases pursuant to 
an order of the Court and is not: (a)&nbsp;an Administrative Claim; (b)&nbsp;a 
Priority Tax Claim; (c)&nbsp;an Other Priority Claim; (d)&nbsp;an Other Secured 
Claim; (e)&nbsp;an RBL Secured Claim; (f)&nbsp;a Second Lien Claim; (g)&nbsp;a 
Senior Notes Claim; (h)&nbsp;an Intercompany Claim; (i)&nbsp;a 
Section&nbsp;510(b)&nbsp;Claim; or (j)&nbsp;a Convenience Claim; <i>provided</i>
that any Holder of a General Unsecured Claim in an Allowed amount greater than 
$500,000 may elect to have such Claim irrevocably reduced to $500,000 and 
treated as a Convenience Claim for purposes of the Plan in full and final 
satisfaction of such Claim.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">76.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Governmental Unit</i>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in 
section&nbsp;101(27) of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">77.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Holder</i>&#148; means any Entity holding a Claim or an 
Interest.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">78.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Huntington Payment</i>&#148; means that payment made to the Debtors 
from Huntington National Bank on July&nbsp;21, 2015, in the amount of
$19,729,905, as a result of the termination of that certain ISDA Master 
Agreement, dated as of December&nbsp;10, 2013, between Huntington National Bank 
and Old Sabine.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">79.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Impaired</i>&#148; means, with respect to a Class&nbsp;of Claims or 
Interests, a Class&nbsp;of Claims or Interests that is not 
Unimpaired.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">80.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Independent Directors&#146; Committee</i>&#148; means that special 
committee formed by Sabine&#146;s board of directors on May&nbsp;15, 2015, to 
conduct and oversee the investigation of potential claims and causes of action 
that the Debtors or certain of their stakeholders might possess against 
creditors and others related to the Combination.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">81.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Intercompany Claim</i>&#148; means any Claim held by one Debtor or a 
Non-Debtor Subsidiary against another Debtor.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">82.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Intercompany Interest</i>&#148; means, other than a Sabine Equity 
Interest, (a)&nbsp;an Interest in one Debtor or Non-Debtor Subsidiary held by 
another Debtor or Non-Debtor Subsidiary or (b)&nbsp;an Interest in a Debtor or a
Non-Debtor Subsidiary held by an Affiliate of a Debtor or a Non-Debtor 
Subsidiary.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">83.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Intercreditor Agreement</i>&#148; means that certain intercreditor 
agreement between Old Sabine (n/k/a Sabine) and certain of its subsidiaries, the
other parties thereto as Guarantors (as defined therein), the RBL Agent, and the
Second Lien Agent, dated as of December&nbsp;14, 2012 (as amended, modified, 
waived, or supplemented from time to time and with all supplements and exhibits 
thereto).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">84.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Interests</i>&#148; means the common stock, limited liability company 
interests, and any other equity, ownership, or profits interests of any Debtor 
and options, warrants, rights, or other securities or agreements to acquire the 
common stock, limited liability company interests, or other equity, ownership, 
or profits interests of any Debtor (whether or not arising under or in 
connection with any employment agreement).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">85.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Interim Compensation Order</i>&#148; means that certain order entered 
by the Court on August&nbsp;10, 2015 [Docket No.&nbsp;156], establishing 
procedures for the compensation of Professionals.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">86.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Judicial Code</i>&#148; means title 28 of the United States Code, 28 
U.S.C. &#167;&#167;&nbsp;1&#151;4001.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">87.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
<i>&#147;LIBOR</i>&#148; shall mean an interest rate based on the London 
interbank offered rate as administered by the ICE Benchmark Administration and 
further described in the Exit Revolver Credit Facility Agreement or the New 
Second Lien Credit Facility Agreement, as applicable.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">88.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Lien</i>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in section&nbsp;101(37)
of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">8<a name="PB_8_114941_5250"></a></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">89.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Management Incentive Plan</i>&#148; means the post-Effective Date 
management incentive plan for the benefit of management, certain continuing 
employees of the Reorganized Debtors and members of the New Board of New Holdco,
as further described in Article&nbsp;IV.M.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">90.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Management Incentive Plan Document</i></font>s&#148; means those 
definitive documents relating to the Management Incentive Plan and included in 
the Plan Supplement, which shall be in form and substance reasonably 
satisfactory to the Debtors and the RBL Agent.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">91.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>ML Commodities Proceeds</i>&#148; means that payment made to the 
Debtors by Merrill Lynch Commodities on July&nbsp;15, 2015, in the amount of
$4,594,250, as a result of the termination of that certain ISDA Master 
Agreement, dated as of November&nbsp;13, 2009, between Merrill Lynch 
Commodities,&nbsp;Inc. and NFR Energy LLC.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">92.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>New Boards</i>&#148; means the initial board of directors, members, or 
managers, as applicable, of New Holdco or each Reorganized Debtor, as 
applicable.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">93.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>New Common Stock</i>&#148; means the number of shares of common stock 
in New Holdco.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">94.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>New Holdco</i>&#148; means the newly-formed Delaware holding company 
that will become the parent of Reorganized Sabine on the Effective Date and the 
issuer of the New Common Stock and Warrants under the Plan.(2)</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">95.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>New Organizational Documents</i>&#148; means the form of the 
certificates or articles of incorporation, bylaws, or such other applicable 
formation documents of New Holdco and each of the Reorganized Debtors, which 
shall be in form and substance reasonably acceptable to the Debtors and the RBL 
Agent.&#160; The New Organizational Documents of New Holdco shall be included in
the Plan Supplement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">96.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>New Second Lien Agent</i>&#148; means the administrative agent 
(including its successors and assigns), in its capacity as administrative agent 
and collateral agent under the New Second Lien Credit Facility Agreement and the
other New Second Lien Credit Facility Documents.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">97.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>New Second Lien Credit Facility</i>&#148; means the second priority 
secured term loan to be made available to the Reorganized Debtors on and after 
the Effective Date pursuant to the New Second Lien Credit Facility 
Agreement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">98.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>New Second Lien Credit Facility Agreement</i>&#148; means that certain 
credit agreement (a substantially final form of which shall be included in the 
Plan Supplement) to be entered into on the Effective Date by and among New 
Holdco, Reorganized Sabine, as borrower, the New Second Lien Agent, and the RBL
Lenders, as lenders thereunder, which shall be in form and substance 
satisfactory to the Debtors and the RBL Agent.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">99.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>New Second Lien Credit Facility Documents</i>&#148; means, 
collectively, the New Second Lien Credit Facility Agreement and all related 
amendments, supplements, ancillary agreements, notes, pledges, collateral 
agreements, mortgages, deeds of trust, and other documents or instruments to be 
executed or delivered in connection with the New Second Lien Credit Facility, 
which shall be in form and substance satisfactory to the Debtors and the RBL 
Agent a</font>nd consistent with the terms set forth in Article&nbsp;IV.B.3 
herein.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">100.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Non-Debtor
Subsidiaries</i>&#148; means: (a)&nbsp;New Forest Oil,&nbsp;Inc.; 
(b)&nbsp;Forest Oil Merger Sub Inc.; (c)&nbsp;Lantern Drilling Company; 
(d)&nbsp;Forest Texas Gathering Company; (e)&nbsp;Sabine NY Merger 
Subsidiary,&nbsp;Inc.; and (f)&nbsp;Sabine Oil and Gas Corporation 
(DE).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">101.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Notice and
Claims Agent</i>&#148; means Prime Clerk LLC.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(2)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The 
structure of New Holdco remains under discussion.</p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">102.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Old Forest
RBL</i>&#148; means that Third Amended and Restated Credit Agreement, dated as 
of June&nbsp;30, 2011 issued to Forest Oil (as amended, supplemented or 
otherwise modified from time to time).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">103.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Old 
Sabine</i>&#148; means that entity Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas LLC in existence 
prior to the Combination.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">104.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Old Sabine
RBL&#148;</i> means the Amended and Restated Credit Agreement, dated as of 
April&nbsp;28, 2009, by and among Old Sabine, as borrower, Wells Fargo Bank, 
National Association, as successor administrative agent, and the other parties 
thereto.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">105.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Old Sabine
Second Lien Credit Facility</i>&#148; means that Second Lien Credit Facility 
Agreement by and among Old Sabine, as borrower, Bank of America, N.A., as 
administrative agent, and the other parties thereto.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">106.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Ordinary 
Course Professionals</i>&#148; shall mean the various attorneys, accountants, 
auditors, and other professionals the Debtors employ in the ordinary course of 
their business and retained by the Debtors pursuant to the Ordinary Course 
Professionals Order.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">107.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Ordinary 
Course Professionals Order</i>&#148; shall mean that certain order entered by 
the Court on August&nbsp;10, 2015 [Docket No.&nbsp;155], establishing the 
procedures for retaining the Ordinary Course Professionals.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">108.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Other 
Priority Claim</i>&#148; means any Allowed Claim against any Debtor entitled to 
priority in right of payment under section&nbsp;507(a)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy 
Code, other than:&#160; (a)&nbsp;an Administrative Claim; or (b)&nbsp;a Priority
Tax Claim, to the extent such Claim has not already been paid during the 
Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">109.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Other 
Secured Claim</i>&#148; means any Secured Claim against any Debtor that is not 
an RBL Secured Claim or Second Lien Adequate Protection Claim.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">110.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Person</i>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in 
section&nbsp;101(41) of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">111.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Petition 
Date</i>&#148; means July&nbsp;15, 2015, the date on which the Debtors commenced
the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">112.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Plan</i>&#148; means this <i>Second Amended Joint Chapter&nbsp;11 Plan 
of Reorganization of Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation and its Debtor 
Affiliates</i> [Docket No.&nbsp;1061, Ex. A], as the same may be further 
amended, supplemented, or modified from time to time in accordance with the 
terms hereof, including the Plan Supplement and all exhibits, supplements, 
appendices and schedules thereto.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">113.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Plan 
Supplement</i></font>&#148; means the documents and forms of documents, 
schedules, and exhibits to the Plan, to be Filed by the Debtors no later than 10
days before the Voting Deadline, and additional documents or amendments to 
previously Filed documents, Filed before the Confirmation Date as amendments to 
the Plan Supplement, including the following, as applicable:&#160; (a)&nbsp;the 
New Organizational Documents of New Holdco and Reorganized Sabine; (b)&nbsp;the 
Warrant Agreements; (c)&nbsp;the Schedule of Rejected Executory Contracts and 
Unexpired Leases; (d)&nbsp;a list of retained Causes of Action; (e)&nbsp;the 
Management Incentive Plan Documents; (f)&nbsp;the Exit Revolver Credit Facility 
Agreement; (g)&nbsp;the New Second Lien Credit Facility Agreement; (h)&nbsp;the 
Registration Rights Agreement; (i)&nbsp;a description of the Restructuring 
Transaction, if applicable; and (j)&nbsp;the Stockholders&#146; Agreement.&#160;
Such documents shall be consistent with the terms hereof and shall be in form 
and substance reasonably acceptable to the Debtors, the RBL Agent, and the 
Second Lien Agent; <i>provided</i> that in the case of the Second Lien Agent, 
only the Warrant Agreements shall be in form and substance reasonably acceptable
to the Second Lien Agent, and all other documents to be included in the Plan 
Supplement shall be deemed to be acceptable to the Second Lien Agent unless the 
terms thereof adversely affect the recoveries of Holders of Second Lien Claims 
in a manner that is disproportionate to other similarly situated minority 
holders of New Common Stock.&#160; The Debtors shall have the right to amend all
of the documents contained in, and the exhibits to, the Plan Supplement through 
the Effective Date, with the consent of the RBL Agent, which consent shall not 
be unreasonably withheld; <i>provided however </i>that the Second Lien Agent 
shall only be given a consent right with respect to (i)&nbsp;amendments to the 
terms of the Warrant Agreements and (ii)&nbsp;amendments to any other documents 
only to the extent that such amendment adversely</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">10<a name="PB_10_115021_536"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='10',FILE='C:\JMS\108224\16-16038-1\task8047710\16038-1-ki-
05.htm',USER='108224',CD='Aug  3 11:50 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">affects the recoveries of Holders of Second Lien 
Claims in a manner that is disproportionate to other similarly situated minority
holders of New Common Stock, in each case which consent shall not be 
unreasonably withheld.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">114.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Priority 
Claims</i>&#148; means Priority Tax Claims and Other Priority Claims.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">115.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Priority 
Tax Claim</i>&#148; means any Claim of a Governmental Unit against a Debtor of 
the kind specified in section&nbsp;507(a)(8)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy 
Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">116.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Pro 
Rata</i>&#148; means the proportion that an Allowed Claim or Allowed Interest in
a particular Class&nbsp;bears to the aggregate amount of Allowed Claims or 
Allowed Interests in that respective Class, or the proportion that Allowed 
Claims or Allowed Interests in a particular Class&nbsp;bear to the aggregate 
amount of Allowed Claims or Allowed Interests in a particular Class&nbsp;and 
other Classes entitled to share in the same recovery as such Allowed Claim or 
Allowed Interests under the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">117.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Professional</i>&#148; means an Entity employed pursuant to a Court 
order in accordance with sections&nbsp;327 or 1103 of the Bankruptcy Code and to
be compensated for services rendered before or on the Confirmation Date, 
pursuant to sections&nbsp;327, 328, 329, 330, or 331 of the Bankruptcy 
Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">118.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>&#147;<i>Professional Fee Escrow</i>&#148; means an interest-bearing 
account, which shall be funded no later than the Effective Date, to hold and 
maintain an amount of Cash equal to the Professional Fee Escrow Amount funded by
the Debtors on the Effective Date solely for the purpose of paying all Allowed 
and unpaid Accrued Professional Compensation Claims of the Debtors&#146; 
Professionals.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">119.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>&#147;<i>Professional Fee Escrow Amount</i>&#148; means the amount of 
Cash transferred by the Debtors to the Professional Fee Escrow to pay Accrued 
Professional Compensation Claims of the Debtors&#146; Professionals.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">120.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Proof of 
Claim</i>&#148; means a proof of Claim Filed against any of the Debtors in the 
Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">121.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>RBL 
Agent</i>&#148; means Wells Fargo Bank, National Association (including its 
predecessors, successors, and assigns), in its capacities as administrative 
agent and collateral agent under the RBL Credit Agreement and the other RBL 
Credit Facility Documents.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">122.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>RBL Credit
Agreement</i>&#148; means that certain Second Amended and Restated Credit 
Agreement, dated as of December&nbsp;16, 2014 (as amended, modified, waived, or 
supplemented from time to time and with all supplements and exhibits thereto), 
by and among Sabine, the RBL Agent and the RBL Lenders party thereto.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">123.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>RBL Credit
Facility</i>&#148; means the reserve-based revolving credit facility under the 
RBL Credit Agreement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">124.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>RBL Credit
Facility Documents</i>&#148; means, collectively, the RBL Credit 
Agreement&nbsp;and all related amendments, supplements, ancillary agreements, 
notes, pledges, documents, collateral agreements, mortgages, deeds of trust, and
other documents or instruments executed or delivered in connection with the RBL 
Credit Facility.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">125.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>RBL Equity
Pool</i>&#148; means ninety-three percent (93%) of the New Common Stock to be 
issued and outstanding as of the Effective Date, subject to dilution by the 
Warrants and shares issued in connection with the Management Incentive 
Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">126.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>RBL 
Lenders</i>&#148; means, collectively, those entities identified as 
&#147;Lenders&#148;, &#147;Issuing Banks&#148;, or &#147;Secured Swap 
Parties&#148; under the RBL Credit Agreement and their predecessors, successors,
and assigns.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">127.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<i>RBL
Released Party</i></font>&#148; means, collectively (a)&nbsp;the RBL Agent (in 
its capacity as agent under the Old Sabine RBL and the RBL Credit Facility 
Documents); (b)&nbsp;the RBL Lenders in their capacities as &#147;Lenders&#148; 
&#147;Issuing Banks&#148; or &#147;Secured Swap Parties&#148; under the RBL 
Credit Facility Documents, the Old Sabine RBL and the Old Forest RBL; and 
(c)&nbsp;such Entity and its affiliates, and such Entity and its
affiliates&#146; current and former equity</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Holders (regardless of whether such Interests are held
directly or indirectly), predecessors, successors, and assigns, subsidiaries, 
and their current and former officers, directors, managers, principals, members,
employees, agents, advisory board members, financial advisors, partners, 
attorneys, accountants, investment bankers, consultants, representatives, and 
other professionals, each in their capacity as such.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">128.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>&#147;<i>RBL
Secured Claim</i>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;any Claim against any Debtor arising from
or based upon the RBL Credit Facility Documents, which shall be Allowed in the 
aggregate principal amount of $926,779,412.40, plus all other obligations 
related thereto, including any accrued unpaid prepetition and post-petition 
interest, costs, fees, and indemnities and (b)&nbsp;any Adequate Protection 
Claims granted as adequate protection for the benefit of the RBL Agent and the 
RBL Lenders.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">129.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>&#147;<i>Registration Rights Agreement</i>&#148; means the Registration 
Rights Agreement with respect to the New Common Stock, substantially in the form
to be included in the Plan Supplement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">130.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>&#147;<i>Reinstated</i>&#148; or &#147;<i>Reinstatement</i></font>&#148; 
means, with respect to Claims and Interests, the treatment provided for in 
section&nbsp;1124 of the Bankruptcy Code.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">131.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Released 
Claims</i>&#148; means all Claims and Causes of Action (</font>other than the 
Settled Claims) made, or which could have been made, on behalf of the Debtors or
the Non-Debtor Subsidiaries, including the constructive fraudulent conveyances, 
the intentional fraudulent transfers, breaches of fiduciary duty, aiding and 
abetting breaches of fiduciary duty, debt recharacterization, equitable 
subordination and other claims for reallocation of value made during the <i>STN 
</i>trial, including the (a)&nbsp;<i>Proposed Complaint for Constructive 
Fraudulent Conveyance and Related Relief</i> annexed to the <i>Motion of the
Official Committee of Unsecured Creditors For (I)&nbsp;Leave, Standing, and 
Authority to Commence and Prosecute Certain Claims and Causes of Action on 
Behalf of The Debtors&#146; Estates And (II)&nbsp;Non-Exclusive Settlement 
Authority</i> [Docket No.&nbsp;518]; (b)&nbsp;<i>Motion of the </i><i>Forest 
Notes Indenture Trustees&#146; for Entry of an Order Pursuant to &#167; 
1109(b)&nbsp;Granting Leave, Standing and Authority to Prosecute and, if 
Appropriate, Settle Certain Claims on Behalf of the Estate of Sabine 
Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation (f/k/a Forest Oil,&nbsp;Inc.)</i> [Docket 
No.&nbsp;521]; (c)&nbsp;<i>Joinder of the Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company,
N.A. to Motion of The Official Committee of Unsecured Creditors for 
(I)&nbsp;Leave, Standing, and Authority to Commence and Prosecute Certain Claims
and Causes of Action on Behalf of the Debtors&#146; Estates; and 
(II)&nbsp;Related Relief </i>[Docket No.&nbsp;520]; (d)&nbsp;<i>Proposed 
Complaint for (I)&nbsp;Intentional Fraudulent Conveyance; (II)&nbsp;Breach of 
Fiduciary Duty; (III)&nbsp;Aiding and Abetting Breach of Fiduciary Duty; 
(IV)&nbsp;Equitable Subordination; (V)&nbsp;Debt Recharacterization; 
(IV)&nbsp;and Related Relief</i> annexed to the<i> Second Motion of the Official
Committee Of Unsecured Creditors for (I)&nbsp;Leave, Standing, and Authority to 
Commence and Prosecute Certain Claims and Causes of Action on Behalf of the 
Debtors&#146; Estates and (II)&nbsp;Non-Exclusive Settlement Authority</i> 
[Docket No.&nbsp;609]; (e)&nbsp;<i>Joinder of the Bank of New York Mellon Trust 
Company, N.A. to Second Motion of the Official Committee of Unsecured Creditors 
For (I)&nbsp;Leave, Standing, And Authority to Commence and Prosecute Certain 
Claims and Causes of Action on Behalf of The Debtors&#146; Estates and 
(II)&nbsp;Non-Exclusive Settlement Authority </i>[Docket No.&nbsp;611]; 
(f)&nbsp;<i>Joinder of the</i><i> Forest Notes Trustees </i><i>to Second Motion 
of the Official Committee of Unsecured Creditors For (I)&nbsp;Leave, Standing, 
and Authority to Commence and Prosecute Certain Claims and Causes of Action on 
Behalf of the Debtors&#146; Estates and (II)&nbsp;Non-Exclusive Settlement 
Authority </i>[Docket No.&nbsp;612]; (g)&nbsp;<i>Notice of Amendment of Motion 
of the Forest Notes Indentures Trustees for Entry of an Order Pursuant to &#167;
1109(B)&nbsp;Granting Leave, Standing and Authority to Prosecute and, if 
Appropriate, Settle Certain Claims on Behalf of the Estate of Sabine 
Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation (f/k/a Forest Oil Corp.)</i> [Docket 
No.&nbsp;712]; and (h)&nbsp;Court&#146;s decision read into the record on 
March&nbsp;24, 2016 at the conclusion of the <i>STN </i>trial.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">132.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Released 
Party</i>&#148; means each of the following in their capacity as such: 
(a)&nbsp;the Second Lien Agent; (b)&nbsp;the Second Lien Lenders; (c)&nbsp;the 
Committee and Committee Members; (d)&nbsp;current direct and indirect Interest 
Holders in Sabine; (e)&nbsp;any Holder of a Claim or Interest; (f)&nbsp;the DTC;
and (g)&nbsp;with respect to each of the Debtors, the Reorganized Debtors, and 
each of the foregoing Entities in clause&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;through (e), such Entity 
and its affiliates, and such Entity and its affiliates&#146; current and former 
equity Holders (regardless of whether such Interests are held directly or 
indirectly), predecessors, successors, and assigns, subsidiaries, and their 
current and former officers, directors, managers, principals, members, 
employees, agents, advisory board members, financial advisors, partners, 
attorneys, accountants, investment bankers, consultants, representatives, and 
other professionals, each in their capacity as such, and only to the extent such
party does not elect on its Ballot or Court-approved election form to opt out of
the third party release contained in Article&nbsp;VIII.G.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">12<a name="PB_12_114702_5133"></a></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='12',FILE='C:\JMS\kgiri\16-16038-1\task8047742\16038-1-ki-
07.htm',USER='105348',CD='Aug  3 11:49 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">133.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Releasing 
Party</i>&#148; means any Holder of a Claim or Interest that does not elect on 
its Ballot or Court-approved election form to opt out of the third party release
contained in Article&nbsp;VIII.G.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">134.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Reorganized Debtors</i>&#148; means the Debtors, or any successors 
thereto, by merger, consolidation, or otherwise, on or after the Effective Date,
including any new entity formed pursuant to the Restructuring Transactions to 
directly or indirectly acquire the assets or equity of the Debtors.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">135.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Reorganized Sabine</i>&#148; means Sabine, or any successor thereto, by
merger, consolidation, or otherwise, on or after the Effective Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">136.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Restructuring Transactions</i>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth 
in Article&nbsp;IV.A.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">137.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Royalty 
and Working Interests</i>&#148;</font> means&nbsp;the working interests granting
the right to exploit oil and gas, and certain other royalty or mineral interests
including but not limited to, landowner&#146;s royalty interests, overriding 
royalty interests, net profit interests, non-participating royalty interests and
production payments.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">138.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Sabine</i>&#148; means Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation, a New 
York corporation and a Debtor in the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">139.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Sabine 
Equity Interests</i>&#148; means existing equity interests in Sabine.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">140.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Schedule 
of Rejected Executory Contracts and Unexpired Leases</i>&#148; means the
schedule (including any amendments or modifications thereto), if any, of certain
Executory Contracts and Unexpired Leases to be rejected by the Debtors pursuant 
to the Plan, as set forth in the Plan Supplement, as amended by the Debtors from
time to time prior to the Confirmation Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">141.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Schedules</i>&#148; means, collectively, the schedules of assets and 
liabilities, schedules of Executory Contracts and Unexpired Leases, and 
statements of financial affairs Filed by the Debtors pursuant to 
section&nbsp;521 of the Bankruptcy Code and in substantial accordance with the 
Official Bankruptcy Forms, as the same may have been amended, modified, or 
supplemented from time to time.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">142.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Second 
Lien Adequate Protection Claim</i></font>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;the Secured 
portion of the Second Lien Claim, including any Second Lien Claim Secured by or 
on account of any Liens granted to the Second Lien Agent or Second Lien Lenders 
pursuant to the Cash Collateral Order and (b)&nbsp;any Adequate Protection 
Claims granted as adequate protection for the benefit of the Second Lien Agent 
or Second Lien Lenders.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">143.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Second 
Lien Agent</i>&#148; means Wilmington Trust, N.A. (including its predecessors, 
successors, and assigns), in its capacity as successor administrative agent 
under the Second Lien Credit Agreement and the other Second Lien Credit Facility
Documents.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">144.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Second 
Lien Claims</i>&#148; means all Claims against any Debtor arising from or based 
upon the Second Lien Credit Facility Documents, which shall be Allowed in the 
aggregate amount of $730,193,301.70, which amount includes all other obligations
related thereto, including any accrued unpaid prepetition interest, costs, fees,
and indemnities.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">145.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Second 
Lien Credit Agreement</i>&#148; means that certain Second Lien Credit Agreement,
dated as of December&nbsp;14, 2012 (as amended, modified, waived, or 
supplemented from time to time and with all supplements and exhibits thereto), 
by and among Sabine, the Second Lien Agent, and the financial institutions and 
lenders from time to time party thereto.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">146.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Second 
Lien Credit Facility</i>&#148; means the term loan credit facility under the 
Second Lien Credit Agreement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">147.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Second 
Lien Credit Facility Documents</i>&#148; means, collectively, the Second Lien 
Credit Agreement&nbsp;and all related&#160; amendments, supplements, ancillary 
agreements, notes, pledges, documents, collateral</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">13<a name="PB_13_114711_7056"></a></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">agreements, mortgages, deeds of trust, and other 
documents or instruments executed or delivered in connection with the Second 
Lien Credit Facility.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">148.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Second 
Lien Deficiency Claim</i>&#148; means the unsecured portion of the Second Lien 
Claim that is not a Second Lien Adequate Protection Claim.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">149.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Second 
Lien Equity Pool</i>&#148; means (a)&nbsp;five percent (5%) of the New Common 
Stock, subject to dilution by the Warrants and (b)&nbsp;one hundred percent 
(100%) of the Tranche 1 Warrants to be issued and outstanding as of the 
Effective Date, <i>provided</i> that each shall be subject to dilution by shares
issued in connection with the Management Incentive Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">150.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Second 
Lien Lenders</i>&#148; means, collectively, the lenders from time to time party 
to the Second Lien Credit Agreement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">151.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Section&nbsp;510(b)&nbsp;Claims</i>&#148; means all Claims against any 
Debtor arising from (a)&nbsp;rescission of a purchase or sale of a security of 
the Debtors or an Affiliate of the Debtors; (b)&nbsp;purchase or sale of such a 
security; or (c)&nbsp;reimbursement or contribution Allowed under 
section&nbsp;502 of the Bankruptcy Code on account of such a Claim.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">152.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Secured</i>&#148; means, when referring to a Claim, a Claim:&#160;
(a)&nbsp;secured by a Lien on property in which the applicable Estate has an 
interest, which Lien is valid, perfected, and enforceable pursuant to applicable
law or by reason of a Court order (including the Cash Collateral Order), or that
is subject to setoff pursuant to section&nbsp;553 of the Bankruptcy Code, to the
extent of the value of the creditor&#146;s interest in such Estate&#146;s 
interest in such property or to the extent of the amount subject to setoff, as 
applicable, as determined pursuant to section&nbsp;506(a)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy
Code; or (b)&nbsp;otherwise Allowed pursuant to the Plan as a Secured 
Claim.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">153.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Secured 
Tax Claims</i>&#148; means any Secured Claim against any Debtor that, absent its
secured status, would be entitled to priority in right of payment under 
section&nbsp;507(a)(8)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code (determined irrespective of 
time limitations), including any related Secured Claim for penalties.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">154.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Securities
Act</i>&#148; means the Securities Act of 1933, 15 U.S.C. 
&#167;&#167;&nbsp;77a&#151;77aa, as amended, or any similar federal, state or 
local law.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">155.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Securities
Exchange Act</i>&#148; means the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, 15 U.S.C. 
&#167;&#167;&nbsp;78a&#151;78nn, as amended.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">156.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Security</i>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in 
section&nbsp;101(49) of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">157.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Senior 
Notes</i>&#148; means, collectively, the: (a)&nbsp;2017 Senior Notes; 
(b)&nbsp;2019 Senior Notes; and (c)&nbsp;&nbsp;2020 Senior Notes.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">158.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Senior 
Notes Claims</i>&#148; means, collectively, the: (a)&nbsp;2017 Senior Notes 
Claims; (b)&nbsp;2019 Senior Notes Claims; and (c)&nbsp;2020 Senior Notes 
Claims.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">159.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Senior 
Notes Holders</i>&#148; means, collectively, the Holders of: (a)&nbsp;2017 
Senior Notes Claims; (b)&nbsp;2019 Senior Notes Claims; and (c)&nbsp;2020 Senior
Notes Claims.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">160.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Senior 
Notes Indentures</i>&#148; means, collectively, the: (a)&nbsp;2017 Senior Notes 
Indenture; (b)&nbsp;2019 Senior Notes Indenture; and (c)&nbsp;2020 Senior Notes 
Indenture.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

New Roman" style="font-

and (c)&nbsp;2020 Senior Notes Indenture Trustee.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

Claims</i>&#148; means all Claims and Causes of Action (</font>other than the

or the Non-Debtor Subsidiaries, including (a)&nbsp;the <i>Proposed Disputed Cash
Complaint</i> and <i>Proposed Lien Scope and Preference Complaint</i> annexed to
the <i>Motion of</i></p>

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">the Official 
Committee of Unsecured Creditors For (I)&nbsp;Leave, Standing, and Authority to 
Commence and Prosecute Certain Claims and Causes of Action on Behalf of The 
Debtors&#146; Estates And (II)&nbsp;Non-Exclusive Settlement 
Authority</font></i> [Docket No.&nbsp;518]; (b)&nbsp;<i>Joinder of the Bank of 
New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A. to Motion of The Official Committee of 
Unsecured Creditors for (I)&nbsp;Leave, Standing, and Authority to Commence and 
Prosecute Certain Claims and Causes of Action on Behalf of the Debtors&#146; 
Estates; and (II)&nbsp;Related Relief </i>[Docket No.&nbsp;520]; 
(c)&nbsp;<i>Motion of the </i><i>Forest Notes Indenture Trustees&#146; for Entry
of an Order Pursuant to &#167; 1109(b)&nbsp;Granting Leave, Standing and 
Authority to Prosecute and, if Appropriate, Settle Certain Claims on Behalf of 
the Estate of Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation (f/k/a Forest 
Oil,&nbsp;Inc.)</i> [Docket No.&nbsp;521]; (d)&nbsp;<i>Notice of Amendment of 
Motion of the Forest Notes Indentures Trustees for Entry of an Order Pursuant to
&#167; 1109(B)&nbsp;Granting Leave, Standing and Authority to Prosecute and, if 
Appropriate, Settle Certain Claims on Behalf of the Estate of Sabine 
Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation (f/k/a Forest Oil Corp.)</i> [Docket 
No.&nbsp;712]; (e)&nbsp;any and all Claims and Causes of Action made, or which 
could have been made, under paragraphs 3(c), 3(g), 11, 12, 13, 15, 29 and 30 of 
the Cash Collateral Order; and (f)&nbsp;any and all Claims and Causes of Action 
that were reserved for the Debtors, the Committee, and any other party in 
interest under paragraphs 22 and 23 of the Cash Collateral Order.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">163.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
<i>&#147;Settlement</i>&#148; means the settlement of the Settled Claims on the 
terms set forth in Article&nbsp;VIII.A.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">164.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
&#147;<i>Stockholders&#146; Agreement</i>&#148; means one or more stockholders 
agreement(s)&nbsp;or limited liability company membership agreement(s), as 
applicable, with respect to the New Common Stock, substantially in the form to 
be included in the Plan Supplement.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">165.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Taxing 
Authority</i>&#148; means any governmental authority exercising any authority to
impose, regulate, levy, asses, or administer the imposition of any 
tax.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">166.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Tranche 1 
Warrants</i>&#148; means the ten-year warrants issued pursuant to the Plan and 
the Tranche 1 Warrant Agreement, which shall be exercisable on a cashless basis 
at a total enterprise value, calculated as of the Effective Date, of $1.0 
billion less the principal amount outstanding under the Exit Revolver Credit 
Facility and the New Second Lien Credit Facility on the Effective Date (in each 
case excluding any amounts deemed borrowed and repaid on the Effective Date) 
plus any Cash retained by the Reorganized Debtors on the Effective Date, for 
fifteen percent (15%) of all shares of New Common Stock (subject to dilution by 
shares issued in connection with the Management Incentive Plan).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">167.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Tranche 1 
Warrant Agreement</i></font>&#148; means that certain agreement providing for, 
among other things, the issuance of the Tranche 1 Warrants, which shall be in 
form and substance, including anti-dilution protections and other rights upon an
applicable &#147;Change of Control&#148; or sale transaction in accordance with 
Article&nbsp;IV.B.1.b(ii)&nbsp;or (iii), reasonably acceptable to the Debtors, 
the RBL Agent and the Second Lien Agent.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">168.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Tranche 2 
Warrants</i>&#148; means the ten-year warrants issued pursuant to the Plan and 
the Tranche 2 Warrant Agreement, which shall be exercisable on a cashless basis 
at a total enterprise value, calculated as of the Effective Date, of $1.25 
billion less the principal amount outstanding under the Exit Revolver Credit 
Facility and the New Second Lien Credit Facility on the Effective Date (in each 
case excluding any amounts deemed borrowed and repaid on the Effective 
Date)&#160; plus any Cash retained by the Reorganized Debtors on the Effective 
Date, for ten percent (10%) of all shares of New Common Stock (subject to 
dilution by shares issued in connection with the Management Incentive 
Plan).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman"><font style="font-
size:10.0pt;">169.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Tranche 2 
Warrant Agreement</i></font>&#148; means that certain agreement providing for, 
among other things, the issuance of the Tranche 2 Warrants, which shall be in 
form and substance, including anti-dilution protections and other rights upon an
applicable &#147;Change of Control&#148; or sale transaction in accordance with 
Article&nbsp;IV.B.1.b(ii)&nbsp;or (iii), reasonably acceptable to the Debtors, 
the RBL Agent and the Second Lien Agent.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">170.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>U.S. 
Trustee</i>&#148; means the Office of the United States Trustee for the Southern
District of New York.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">171.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;<i>Unexpired 
Lease</i>&#148; means a lease of nonresidential real property to which one or 
more of the Debtors is a party that is subject to assumption or rejection under 
sections&nbsp;365 or 1123 of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>

style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
