<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
style:italic;">J.</font></i>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160;&#160; <b><i style="font-weight:bold;">Waiver of Statutory 
Limitations on Releases</i></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Each Releasing
Party in each of the releases contained in the Plan (including under 
Article&nbsp;VIII of the Plan) expressly acknowledges that although ordinarily a
general release may not extend to Claims which the Releasing Party does not know
or suspect to exist in his favor, which if known by it may have materially 
affected its settlement with the party released, each Releasing Party has 
carefully considered and taken into account in determining to enter into the 
above releases the possible existence of such unknown losses or Claims.&#160; 
Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, each Releasing Party expressly
waives any and all rights conferred upon it by any statute or rule&nbsp;of law 
which provides that a release does not extend to Claims which the claimant does 
not know or suspect to exist in its favor at the time of executing the release, 
which if known by it may have materially affected its settlement with the RBL 
Released Party or the Released Party, including the provisions of California 
Civil Code Section&nbsp;1542.&#160; The releases contained in Article&nbsp;VIII 
of the Plan are effective regardless of whether those released matters are 
presently known, unknown, suspected or unsuspected, foreseen or 
unforeseen.</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">K.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Protection Against Discriminatory Treatment</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Consistent with section&nbsp;525 of the 
Bankruptcy Code and the Supremacy Clause of the U.S. Constitution, all Entities,
including Governmental Units, shall not discriminate against the Reorganized 
Debtors or deny, revoke, suspend, or refuse to renew a license, permit, charter,
franchise, or other similar grant to, condition such a grant to, discriminate 
with respect to such a grant against, the Reorganized Debtors, or another Entity
with whom the Reorganized Debtors have been associated, solely because each 
Debtor has been a debtor under chapter&nbsp;11 of the Bankruptcy Code, has been 
insolvent before the commencement of the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases (or during the 
Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases but before the Debtors are granted or denied a discharge),
or has not paid a debt that is dischargeable in the Chapter&nbsp;11 
Cases.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">L.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Subordination</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except as otherwise provided in the Plan, 
any distributions under the Plan to Holders shall be received and retained free 
from any obligations to hold or transfer the same to any other Holder and shall 
not be subject to levy, garnishment, attachment, or other legal process by any 
Holder by reason of claimed contractual subordination rights.&#160; Any such 
subordination rights shall be waived, and the Confirmation Order shall 
constitute an injunction enjoining any Entity from and after the Effective Date
from enforcing or attempting to enforce any contractual, legal, or equitable 
subordination rights to property distributed under the Plan, in each case other 
than as provided in the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subject to entry of 
the Confirmation Order and Article&nbsp;VIII.A and VIII.C, the allowance, 
classification, and treatment of all Allowed Claims and Interests and the 
respective distributions and treatments under the Plan take into account and 
conform to the relative priority and rights of the Claims and Interests in each 
Class&nbsp;in connection with any contractual, legal, and equitable 
subordination rights relating thereto, whether arising under general principles 
of equitable subordination, section 510(b)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code, or 
otherwise, except as specifically provided for under the Plan. Notwithstanding 
anything herein to the contrary, and as provided in Article&nbsp;III of the 
Plan, no Holder of a Section&nbsp;510(b)&nbsp;Claim shall receive any 
distribution on account of such Section&nbsp;510(b)</font>&nbsp;Claim, and all 
Section&nbsp;510(b)&nbsp;Claims shall be extinguished.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
style:italic;">M.</font></i>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; <i>Setoffs</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except as otherwise provided herein and 
subject to applicable law, the Debtors may, pursuant to the Bankruptcy Code 
(including section 553 of the Bankruptcy Code), applicable non-bankruptcy law, 
or as may be agreed to by the Holder of a Claim or Interest, set off against any
Allowed Claim or Interest (which setoff shall be made against the Allowed Claim 
or Interest, not against any distributions to be made under the Plan with 
respect to such Allowed Claim or Interest), any Claims, rights, and Causes of 
Action of any nature that such Debtor may hold against the Holder of such 
Allowed Claim or Interest, to the extent such Claims, rights, or Causes of 
Action against such Holder have not been otherwise released, waived, 
relinquished, exculpated, compromised, or settled on or prior to the Effective 
Date (whether pursuant to the Plan or otherwise), and any distribution to which 
a Holder is entitled under the Plan shall be made on account of the Claim or 
Interest, as reduced after application of the setoff described above.&#160; In 
no event shall any Holder of Claims or Interests be entitled to setoff any Claim
or Interest against any</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">49<a name="PB_49_115745_4688"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='49',FILE='C:\JMS\kgiri\16-16038-1\task8047742\16038-1-ki-

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Claim, right, or Cause of Action of the Debtors unless
such Holder obtains entry of a Final Order entered by the Court authorizing such
setoff or unless such setoff is otherwise agreed to in writing by the Debtors 
and a Holder of a Claim or Interest; <i>provided</i> that, where there is no 
written agreement between the Debtors and a Holder of a Claim authorizing such
setoff, nothing herein shall prejudice or be deemed to have prejudiced the 
Debtors&#146; rights to assert that any Holder&#146;s setoff rights were 
required to have been asserted by motion to the Court prior to the Effective 
Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><i><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
style:italic;">N.</font></i>&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160;&#160; <i>Special Provision Governing Accrued Professional Compensation 
Claims and Final Fee Applications</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">For the avoidance of doubt, the releases in
Article&nbsp;VIII of the Plan shall not waive, affect, limit, restrict, or 
otherwise modify the right of any party in interest to object to any Accrued 
Professional Compensation Claim or final fee application Filed by any 
Professional in the Chapter 11 Cases.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;IX.<br> CONDITIONS PRECEDENT TO CONFIRMATION AND 
CONSUMMATION OF THE PLAN</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">A.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Conditions Precedent to Confirmation</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">It shall be a condition to confirmation of 
the Plan that the following conditions shall have been satisfied (or waived 
pursuant to Article&nbsp;IX.C hereof):</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>The Disclosure Statement shall have been in form and substance reasonably
acceptable to the Debtors and the RBL Agent (which consent shall not be 
unreasonably withheld), and an order finding that the Disclosure Statement 
contains adequate information pursuant to section 1125 of the Bankruptcy Code 
shall have been entered by the Court; and</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>The proposed Confirmation Order shall be in form and substance reasonably
satisfactory to the Debtors, the RBL Agent (which consent shall not be 
unreasonably withheld), and the Second Lien Agent (but only with respect to the
terms of the Plan that adversely affects the recoveries of Holders of Second 
Lien Claims in a manner that is disproportionate to other similarly situated 
minority holders of New Common Stock).</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">B.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Conditions Precedent to the Effective Date</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">It shall be a condition to Consummation of 
the Plan that the following conditions shall have been satisfied (or waived 
pursuant to the provisions of Article&nbsp;IX.C hereof):</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>The Confirmation Order shall have become a Final Order that has not been 
stayed or modified or vacated on appeal;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>The Professional Fee Escrow shall have been established and funded in 
Cash in accordance with Article&nbsp;II.B.1 of the Plan;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>The Exit Revolver Credit Facility Documents shall have been executed and 
delivered by all of the Entities that are parties thereto, and all conditions 
precedent to the consummation of the Exit Revolver Credit Facility shall have 
been waived or satisfied in accordance with the terms thereof, and the closing 
of the Exit Revolver Credit Facility shall have occurred;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>The New Second Lien Credit Facility Documents shall have been executed 
and delivered by all of the Entities that are parties thereto, and all 
conditions precedent to the consummation of the New Second Lien Credit Facility 
shall have been waived or satisfied in accordance with the terms thereof and the
closing of the New Second Lien Credit Facility shall have occurred;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>All actions and all agreements, instruments or other documents necessary 
to implement the Plan (including the Stockholders&#146; Agreement, the 
Registration Rights Agreement, and the Warrant</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">50<a name="PB_50_115754_2983"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='50',FILE='C:\JMS\kgiri\16-16038-1\task8047742\16038-1-ki-

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Agreements) shall have been effected or executed and 
delivered, as applicable, by no later than June&nbsp;30, 2016, and shall be 
reasonably acceptable to the Debtors and the RBL Agent; and</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>The Debtors shall have received any authorizations, consents, regulatory 
approvals, rulings, letters, no-action letters, opinions or documents that are 
necessary to implement the Plan and that are required by law, regulation or 
order.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">C.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i>Waiver
of Conditions</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The conditions to the confirmation of the 
Plan and Effective Date of the Plan set forth in this Article&nbsp;IX may be 
waived only by the Debtors with the consent of the RBL Agent, which consent 
shall not be unreasonably withheld, without notice, leave, or order of the Court
or any formal action other than proceedings to confirm or consummate the 
Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">D.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Substantial Consummation</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;Substantial Consummation&#148; of the
Plan, as defined in 11 U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;1101(2), shall be deemed to occur on 
the Effective Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">E.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Effect of Non-Occurrence of Conditions to the Effective Date</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If the Effective Date does not occur, then:
(1)&nbsp;the Plan shall be null and void in all respects; (2)&nbsp;any 
settlement or compromise embodied in the Plan (including the fixing or limiting 
to an amount certain of any Claim or Interest or Class&nbsp;of Claims or 
Interests), assumption or rejection of Executory Contracts or Unexpired Leases 
effected by the Plan, and any document or agreement executed pursuant to the 
Plan, shall be deemed null and void; and (3)&nbsp;nothing contained in the Plan 
or the Disclosure Statement shall: (a)&nbsp;constitute a waiver or release of 
any Claims or Interests; (b)&nbsp;prejudice in any manner the rights of the 
Debtors or any other Person or Entity; or (c)&nbsp;constitute an admission, 
acknowledgement, offer, or undertaking of any sort by the Debtors or any other 
Person or Entity.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;X.<br> MODIFICATION, REVOCATION, OR WITHDRAWAL OF THE
PLAN</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">A.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Modification and Amendments</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subject to the 
limitations contained herein, the Debtors, with the consent of the RBL Agent, 
which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld, and the Second Lien Agent (but
only with respect to (i)&nbsp;amendments to the terms of the Warrant Agreements 
and (ii)&nbsp;amendments to any other documents only to the extent that such 
amendment adversely affects the recoveries of Holders of Second Lien Claims in a
manner that is disproportionate to other similarly situated minority holders of 
New Common Stock</font>), which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld, 
reserve the right to modify the Plan and seek Confirmation consistent with the 
Bankruptcy Code and, as appropriate, not resolicit votes on such modified 
Plan.&nbsp; Subject to certain restrictions and requirements set forth in 
section&nbsp;1127 of the Bankruptcy Code and Bankruptcy Rule&nbsp;3019 and those
restrictions on modifications set forth in the Plan, the Debtors, with the 
consent of the RBL Agent, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld, and 
the Second Lien Agent (but only with respect to (i)&nbsp;amendments to the terms
of the Warrant Agreements and (ii)&nbsp;amendments to any other documents only 
to the extent that such amendment adversely affects the recoveries of Holders of
Second Lien Claims in a manner that is disproportionate to other similarly 
situated minority holders of New Common Stock), which consent shall not be 
unreasonably withheld, expressly reserve their rights to alter, amend, or modify
materially the Plan with respect to the Debtors, one or more times, after 
Confirmation, and, to the extent necessary, may initiate proceedings in the 
Court to so alter, amend, or modify the Plan, or remedy any defect or omission, 
or reconcile any inconsistencies in the Plan, the Disclosure Statement, or the 
Confirmation Order, in such matters as may be necessary to carry out the 
purposes and intent of the Plan.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">51<a name="PB_51_115808_6228"></a></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">B.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Effect of Confirmation on Modifications</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Entry of the Confirmation Order shall mean 
that all modifications or amendments to the Plan occurring after the 
solicitation thereof are approved pursuant to section&nbsp;1127(a)&nbsp;of the 
Bankruptcy Code and do not require additional disclosure or resolicitation under
Bankruptcy Rule&nbsp;3019.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">C.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Revocation or Withdrawal of the Plan</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Debtors reserve the right to revoke or 
withdraw the Plan prior to the Confirmation Date, subject to the consent of the 
RBL Agent, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld; <i>provided, 
however</i>, that notwithstanding the forgoing, the Debtors shall be permitted 
to revoke or withdraw the Plan without such consent if doing so is required to 
satisfy their fiduciary duties.&#160; If the Debtors revoke or withdraw the 
Plan, or if Confirmation and Consummation does not occur, then:&#160; 
(1)&nbsp;the Plan shall be null and void in all respects; (2)&nbsp;any
settlement or compromise embodied in the Plan (including the fixing or limiting 
to an amount certain of any Claim or Interest or Class&nbsp;of Claims or 
Interests), assumption or rejection of Executory Contracts or Unexpired Leases 
effected by the Plan, and any document or agreement executed pursuant to the 
Plan, shall be deemed null and void; and (3)&nbsp;nothing contained in the Plan 
shall:&#160; (i)&nbsp;constitute a waiver or release of any Claims or Interests;
(ii)&nbsp;prejudice in any manner the rights of the Debtors or any other Entity,
including the Holders of Claims or the Non-Debtor Subsidiaries; or 
(iii)&nbsp;constitute an admission, acknowledgement, offer, or undertaking of 
any sort by the Debtors or any other Entity, including the Non-Debtor 
Subsidiaries.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;XI.<br> RETENTION OF JURISDICTION</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding the entry of the 
Confirmation Order and the occurrence of the Effective Date, on and after the 
Effective Date, the Court shall retain jurisdiction over the Chapter&nbsp;11 
Cases and all matters, arising out of, or related to, the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases 
and the Plan, including jurisdiction to:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">1.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>Allow, Disallow, determine, liquidate, classify, estimate, or establish 
the priority, Secured or unsecured status, or amount of any Claim or Interest, 
including the resolution of any request for payment of any Administrative Claim 
and the resolution of any and all objections to the Secured or unsecured status,
priority, amount, or allowance of Claims or Interests;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">2.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>decide and resolve all matters related to the granting and denying, in 
whole or in part, any applications for allowance of compensation or 
reimbursement of expenses to Professionals authorized pursuant to the Bankruptcy
Code or the Plan;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">3.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>resolve any matters related to:&#160; (a)&nbsp;the assumption and 
assignment or rejection of any Executory Contract or Unexpired Lease to which a 
Debtor is a party or with respect to which a Debtor may be liable in any manner 
and to hear, determine, and, if necessary, liquidate, any Claims arising 
therefrom, including Claims related to the rejection of an Executory Contract or
Unexpired Lease, Cure Costs pursuant to section&nbsp;365 of the Bankruptcy Code,
or any other matter related to such Executory Contract or Unexpired Lease;
(b)&nbsp;the Reorganized Debtors amending, modifying, or supplementing, after 
the Confirmation Date, pursuant to Article&nbsp;V hereof, any Executory 
Contracts or Unexpired Leases to the list of Executory Contracts and Unexpired 
Leases to be assumed and assigned or rejected or otherwise; and (c)&nbsp;any 
dispute regarding whether a contract or lease is or was executory or 
expired;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">4.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>ensure that distributions to Holders of Allowed Claims and Interests are 
accomplished pursuant to the provisions of the Plan;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">5.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>adjudicate, decide, or resolve any motions, adversary proceedings, 
contested, or litigated matters, and any other matters, and grant or deny any 
applications involving a Debtor that may be pending on the Effective Date;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">52<a name="PB_52_115917_6395"></a></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">6.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>adjudicate, decide, or resolve any and all matters related to Causes of 
Action;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">7.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>adjudicate, decide, or resolve any and all matters related to 
section&nbsp;1141 of the Bankruptcy Code;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">8.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>enter and implement such orders as may be necessary or appropriate to 
execute, implement, or consummate the provisions of the Plan and all contracts, 
instruments, releases, indentures, and other agreements or documents created in 
connection with the Plan or the Disclosure Statement;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">9.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>enter and enforce any order for the sale of property pursuant to 
sections&nbsp;363, 1123, or 1146(a)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">10.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>resolve any cases, controversies, 
suits, disputes, or Causes of Action that may arise in connection with the 
Consummation, interpretation, or enforcement of the Plan or any Entity&#146;s 
obligations incurred in connection with the Plan;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">11.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>issue injunctions, enter and implement 
other orders, or take such other actions as may be necessary or appropriate to 
restrain interference by any Entity with Consummation or enforcement of the 
Plan;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">12.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>resolve any cases, controversies, 
suits, disputes, or Causes of Action with respect to the settlements, 
compromises, discharges, releases, injunctions, exculpations, and other 
provisions contained in Article&nbsp;VIII hereof and enter such orders as may be
necessary or appropriate to implement such releases, injunctions, and other 
provisions;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">13.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>resolve any cases, controversies, 
suits, disputes, or Causes of Action with respect to the repayment or return of 
distributions and the recovery of additional amounts owed by the Holder of a 
Claim or Interest for amounts not timely repaid pursuant to Article&nbsp;VI.G.1 
hereof;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">14.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>enter and implement such orders as are 
necessary or appropriate if the Confirmation Order is for any reason modified, 
stayed, reversed, revoked, or vacated;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">15.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>determine any other matters that may 
arise in connection with or relate to the Plan, the Disclosure Statement, the 
Confirmation Order, or the Plan Supplement; <i>provided </i>that the Court shall
not retain jurisdiction over disputes concerning documents contained in the Plan
Supplement that have a jurisdictional, forum selection or dispute resolution 
clause that refers disputes to a different court;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">16.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>adjudicate any and all disputes arising
from or relating to distributions under the Plan or any transactions 
contemplated therein;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">17.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>consider any modifications of the Plan,
to cure any defect or omission, or to reconcile any inconsistency in any Court 
order, including the Confirmation Order;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">18.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>determine requests for the payment of 
Claims and Interests entitled to priority pursuant to section&nbsp;507 of the 
Bankruptcy Code;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">19.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>hear and determine matters concerning 
state, local, and federal taxes in accordance with sections&nbsp;346, 505, and 
1146 of the Bankruptcy Code;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">20.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>hear and determine all disputes 
involving the existence, nature, or scope of the release provisions set forth in
the Plan, including any dispute relating to any liability arising out of the 
termination of employment or the termination of any employee or retiree benefit 
program, regardless of whether such termination occurred prior to or after the 
Effective Date;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">21.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>enforce all orders previously entered 
by the Court;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">53<a name="PB_53_115926_6479"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">22.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>hear any other matter not inconsistent 
with the Bankruptcy Code;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">23.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>enter an order concluding or closing 
the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">24.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>enforce all orders previously entered 
by the Court, resolve any cases, controversies, suits, or disputes that may 
arise in connection with the consummation, interpretation, or any contract, 
instrument, release, or other agreement or document that is entered into or 
delivered pursuant thereto or any Entity&#146;s rights arising from or 
obligations incurred in connection with the Plan or such documents; and</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">25.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>enforce the injunction, release, and 
exculpation provisions set forth in Article&nbsp;VIII hereof.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">As of the Effective Date, notwithstanding 
anything in this Article&nbsp;XI to the contrary, the Exit Revolver Credit 
Facility Documents, the New Second Lien Credit Facility Documents and any 
documents set forth in the Plan Supplement shall be governed by the respective 
jurisdictional provisions therein.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">ARTICLE&nbsp;XII.<br> MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">A.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Immediate Binding Effect</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subject to Article&nbsp;IX.A hereof and 
notwithstanding Bankruptcy Rules&nbsp;3020(e), 6004(h), or 7062 or otherwise, 
upon the occurrence of the Effective Date, the terms of the Plan, the final 
versions of the documents contained in the Plan Supplement, and the Confirmation
Order shall be immediately effective and enforceable and deemed binding upon the
Debtors, the Reorganized Debtors, and any and all Holders of Claims or Interests
(regardless of whether such Claims or Interests are deemed to have accepted or 
rejected the Plan), all Entities that are parties to or are subject to the 
settlements, compromises, releases, and injunctions described in the Plan, each 
Entity acquiring property under the Plan or the Confirmation Order, and any and 
all non-Debtor parties to Executory Contracts and Unexpired Leases with the 
Debtors.&#160; All Claims and debts shall be as fixed, adjusted, or compromised,
as applicable, pursuant to the Plan regardless of whether any Holder of a Claim 
or debt has voted on the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">B.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Additional Documents</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On or before the Effective Date, the 
Debtors may File with the Court such agreements and other documents as may be 
necessary or appropriate to effectuate and further evidence the terms and 
conditions of the Plan.&#160; The Debtors and all Holders of Claims or Interests
receiving distributions pursuant to the Plan and all other parties in interest 
shall, from time to time, prepare, execute, and deliver any agreements or 
documents and take any other actions as may be necessary or advisable to 
effectuate the provisions and intent of the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">C.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Dissolution of the Committee</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">On the Effective Date, the Committee shall 
dissolve and all members, employees, or agents thereof shall be released and 
discharged from all rights and duties arising from or related to the 
Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases.&#160; The Reorganized Debtors shall not be responsible 
for paying any fees or expenses incurred by the members of or advisors to the 
Committee after the Effective Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">D.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Reservation of Rights</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except as expressly set forth in the Plan, 
the Plan shall have no force or effect unless the Court shall enter the 
Confirmation Order.&#160; Neither the Plan, any statement or provision contained
in the Plan, nor any action taken or not taken by any Debtor with respect to the
Plan, the Disclosure Statement, the Confirmation Order, or the Plan Supplement 
shall be or shall be deemed to be an admission or waiver of any rights of the 
Debtors, with respect to the Holders of Claims or Interests prior to the 
Effective Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">54<a name="PB_54_115935_2639"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='54',FILE='C:\JMS\kgiri\16-16038-1\task8047742\16038-1-ki-
15.htm',USER='105348',CD='Aug  3 12:00 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">E.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Successors and Assigns</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The rights, benefits, and obligations of 
any Entity named or referred to in the Plan or the Confirmation Order shall be 
binding on, and shall inure to the benefit of any heir, executor, administrator,
successor or assign, affiliate, officer, director, manager, agent, 
representative, attorney, beneficiaries, or guardian, if any, of each 
Entity.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">F.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Service of Documents</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Any pleading, notice, or other document 
required by the Plan to be served on or delivered to the Debtors, Reorganized 
Debtors, RBL Agent or Second Lien Agent shall be served on:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-1.5in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If to the Debtors, 
to:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas 
Corporation<br> 1415 Louisiana, Suite&nbsp;1600 </font><br> Houston, Texas 
77002<br> Attn.:&#160; Michael Magilton</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-1.5in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">With copies to:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Kirkland&nbsp;&amp; Ellis 
LLP<br> Kirkland&nbsp;&amp; Ellis International LLP<br> 601 Lexington 
Avenue</font><br> New York, New York 10022<br> Attn.:&#160; Jonathan S. Henes, 
P.C., Christopher Marcus, P.C. and Cristine Pirro</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Kirkland&nbsp;&amp; Ellis LLP<br> Kirkland&nbsp;&amp; 
Ellis International LLP<br> 300 North LaSalle Drive<br> Chicago,&nbsp;Illinois 
60654<br> Attn.:&#160; Ryan B. Bennett and Brad Weiland</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-1.5in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If to the RBL Agent:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Linklaters LLP <br> 1345 Avenue
of the Americas</font><br> New York, New York 10105<br> Attn.:&#160; Margot B. 
Schonholtz and Robert H. Trust</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-1.5in;"><font size="2"
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If to the Second Lien 
Agent:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, 
Wharton&nbsp;&amp; Garrison LLP<br> 1285 Avenue of the Americas</font><br> New 
York, New York 10019<br> Attn.:&#160; Brian S. Hermann, Kyle J. Kimpler and 
Kellie A. Cairns</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">G.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i>Term 
of Injunctions or Stays</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Unless otherwise provided in the Plan or in
the Confirmation Order, all injunctions or stays in effect in the 
Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases pursuant to sections&nbsp;105 or 362 of the Bankruptcy 
Code or any order of the Court, and extant on the Confirmation Date (excluding 
any injunctions or stays contained in the Plan or the Confirmation Order) shall 
remain in full force and effect until the Effective Date.&#160; All injunctions 
or stays contained in the Plan or the Confirmation Order shall remain in full 
force and effect in accordance with their terms.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">55<a name="PB_55_115947_2794"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='55',FILE='C:\JMS\kgiri\16-16038-1\task8047742\16038-1-ki-
15.htm',USER='105348',CD='Aug  3 12:00 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">H.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i>Entire
Agreement</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except as otherwise indicated, the Plan, 
the Confirmation Order, the documents set forth in the Plan Supplement, the Exit
Revolver Credit Facility Documents and the New Second Lien Credit Facility 
Documents, supersede all previous and contemporaneous negotiations, promises, 
covenants, agreements, understandings, and representations on such subjects, all
of which have become merged and integrated into the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">I.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160;&#160; </font><i>Exhibits</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">All exhibits and documents included in the 
Plan Supplement are incorporated into and are a part of the Plan as if set forth
in full in the Plan.&#160; After the exhibits and documents are Filed, copies of
such exhibits and documents shall be available upon written request to the 
Debtors&#146; counsel at the address above or by downloading such exhibits and 
documents from the Debtors&#146; restructuring website at 
https://cases.primeclerk.com/sabine/ or the Court&#146;s website at 
http://www.nysb.uscourts.gov/.&#160; To the extent any exhibit or document is 
inconsistent with the terms of the Plan, unless otherwise ordered by the Court, 
the non-exhibit or non-document portion of the Plan shall control.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">J.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
; </font><i>Nonseverability of Plan Provisions</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If, prior to Confirmation, any term or 
provision of the Plan is held by the Court to be invalid, void, or 
unenforceable, the Court shall be prohibited from altering or interpreting such 
term or provision to make it valid or enforceable, <i>provided</i> that at the 
request of the Debtors, the Court shall have the power to alter and interpret 
such term or provision to make it valid or enforceable to the maximum extent 
practicable, consistent with the original purpose of the term or provision held 
to be invalid, void or unenforceable, and such terms or provision shall then be 
applicable as altered or interpreted; <i>provided further </i>&#160;that any 
such alteration or interpretation shall be acceptable to the Debtors.&#160; The 
Confirmation Order shall constitute a judicial determination and shall provide 
that each term and provision of the Plan, as it may have been altered or 
interpreted in accordance with the foregoing, is: (1)&nbsp;valid and enforceable
pursuant to its terms; (2)&nbsp;integral to the Plan and may not be deleted or 
modified without the Debtors&#146; consent; and (3)&nbsp;nonseverable and 
mutually dependent.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">K.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><i>Votes 
Solicited in Good Faith</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Upon entry of the Confirmation Order, the 
Debtors will be deemed to have solicited votes on the Plan in good faith and in 
compliance with the Bankruptcy Code, and pursuant to 
section&nbsp;1125(e)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code, the Debtors and each of their 
respective Affiliates, agents, representatives, members, principals, 
shareholders, officers, directors, employees, advisors, and attorneys will be 
deemed to have participated in good faith and in compliance with the Bankruptcy
Code in the offer, issuance, sale, and purchase of Securities offered and sold 
under the Plan and any previous plan, and, therefore, neither any of such 
parties or individuals or the Reorganized Debtors will have any liability for 
the violation of any applicable law, rule, or regulation governing the 
solicitation of votes on the Plan or the offer, issuance, sale, or purchase of 
the Securities offered and sold under the Plan and any previous plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">L.</font></i><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><i>Closing of Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases</i></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The Reorganized Debtors shall, promptly 
after the full administration of the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases, File with the Court 
all documents required by Bankruptcy Rule&nbsp;3022 and any applicable order of 
the Court to close the Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">56<a name="PB_56_115956_8299"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Respectfully submitted, as of the date 
first set forth above,</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman"
