<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="33%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:33.5%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;Debtors.</font></p>    </td>
<td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.34%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>    </td>
<td width="36%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:36.66%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">(Jointly   Administered)</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr>
<td width="60%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 
0in;width:60.0%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>
<td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.34%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">)</font></p>    </td>
<td width="36%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:36.66%;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>    </td>   </tr>
<tr height="0">
<td width="188" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="237" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="24" style="border:none;"></td>
<td width="260" style="border:none;"></td>   </tr> </table>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-
weight:bold;">FINDINGS OF FACT,<br> CONCLUSIONS OF LAW, AND<br> ORDER CONFIRMING
THE DEBTORS&#146; SECOND<br> AMENDED JOINT CHAPTER 11 PLAN OF 
REORGANIZATION</font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The above-captioned debtors and debtors in 
possession (collectively, the &#147;<u>Debtors</u>&#148;), having:(1)</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">a.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>commenced the above-captioned chapter 11 cases (the &#147;<u>Chapter 11 
Cases</u>&#148;) by filing voluntary petitions for relief under chapter 11 of 
title 11 of the United States Code (the&nbsp;&#147;<u>Bankruptcy Code</u>&#148;)
on July&nbsp;15, 2015 (the &#147;<u>Petition Date</u>&#148;);</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">b.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>continued to operate their businesses and manage their properties as 
debtors in possession pursuant to sections 1107(a)&nbsp;and 1108 of the 
Bankruptcy Code;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">c.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
; </font>filed, on January&nbsp;26, 2016, (i)&nbsp;the <i>Joint Chapter 11 Plan 
of Reorganization of Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation and Its Debtor 
Affiliates </i>[Docket No.&nbsp;748], which plan and related documents were 
subsequently amended, (ii)&nbsp;the <i>Disclosure Statement for Joint Chapter 11
Plan of Reorganization of Sabine Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation and Its Debtor 
Affiliates </i>[Docket&nbsp;No.&nbsp;749], which disclosure statement and 
related documents were subsequently amended, and (iii)&nbsp;the <i>Debtors&#146;
Motion for the Entry of an Order Approving (A)&nbsp;the Adequacy of the 
Disclosure Statement, (B)&nbsp;Solicitation and Notice Procedures with Respect 
to Confirmation of the Joint Chapter 11 Plan of Reorganization of Sabine 
Oil&nbsp;&amp; Gas Corporation and Its Debtor Affiliates, (C)&nbsp;the Forms of 
Ballots and Notices in Connection Therewith, and (D)&nbsp;the Scheduling of 
Certain Dates with Respect Thereto </i>[Docket&nbsp;No.&nbsp;750];</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:black;"></div>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-
indent:-.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(1)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Unless 
otherwise noted, capitalized terms not defined in this <i>Findings of Fact, 
Conclusions of Law, and Order Confirming Debtors&#146; Second Amended Joint 
Chapter 11 Plan of Reorganization</i> (this 
&#147;<u>Confirmation&nbsp;Order</u>&#148;) shall have the meanings ascribed to 
them in the Plan (as defined herein).&#160; The rules&nbsp;of interpretation set
forth in Article&nbsp;I.B of the Plan shall apply to this Confirmation 
Order.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

align:center;">1<a name="PB_1_120506_7931"></a></p>

&#147;<u>Mitchell Rebuttal</u>&#148;);</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">r.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160;&#160; </font>filed, on June&nbsp;6, 2016, the <i>Declaration and 
Rebuttal Report of David Sambrooks in Response to Expert Report of Adrian A. 
Reed Relating to Debtors&#146; Second Amended Joint Chapter 11 Plan of 
Reorganization </i>[Docket No.&nbsp;1225] (the&nbsp;&#147;<u>Sambrooks 
Rebuttal</u>&#148;);</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">3<a name="PB_3_120654_5335"></a></p>

style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">c.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
; </font>set June&nbsp;3, 2016, at 5:00 p.m.&nbsp;prevailing Eastern Time, as 
the deadline for voting on the Plan;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">d.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>set June&nbsp;13, 21-22, and 27, 2016, at 9:30 a.m.&nbsp;prevailing 
Eastern Time, June&nbsp;22,&nbsp;2016 at 9:00 a.m.&nbsp;prevailing Eastern Time,
and June&nbsp;14, July&nbsp;5-8, and 13, 2016 at 10:00 a.m.&nbsp;prevailing 
Eastern Time, as the dates and times for the Confirmation Hearing pursuant to 
Bankruptcy Rules&nbsp;3017 and 3018 and sections 1126, 1128, and 1129 of the 
Bankruptcy Code;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">e.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
; </font>reviewed the Plan, the Disclosure Statement, the Confirmation Brief, 
the Reply Brief, the Confirmation Declarations, the Voting Certification, and 
all pleadings, exhibits, statements, responses, and comments regarding 
Confirmation, including all objections, statements, and reservations of rights 
filed by parties in interest on the docket of the Chapter 11 Cases;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">f.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160; </font>held the Confirmation Hearing;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">g.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
; </font>heard the statements, arguments, and objections made by counsel in 
respect of Confirmation;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">h.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</font>considered all testimony, documents, filings, and other evidence admitted
at Confirmation; and</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">i.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>overruled any and all objections to the Plan and to 
Confirmation and all statements and reservations of rights not consensually 
resolved or withdrawn unless otherwise indicated herein.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, the Court having found that
notice of the Confirmation Hearing and the opportunity for any party in interest
to object to Confirmation has been adequate and appropriate as to all parties 
affected or to be affected by the Plan and the transactions contemplated 
thereby, and the legal and factual bases set forth in the documents filed in 
support of Confirmation and all evidence proffered or adduced by counsel at the 
Confirmation Hearing establish just cause for the relief granted herein; and 
after due deliberation thereon and good cause appearing therefor, the Court 
hereby makes and issues the following Findings of Fact and Conclusions of Law 
and Orders:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">5<a name="PB_5_120718_2897"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\JMS\kgiri\16-16038-1\task8048152\16038-1-ks-
01.htm',USER='105348',CD='Aug  3 15:46 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">I.<u>
FINDINGS OF FACT AND CONCLUSIONS OF LAW</u></font></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">IT IS HEREBY DETERMINED FOUND, ADJUDGED, DECREED, AND 
ORDERED THAT:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">A.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Findings and Conclusions.</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; The findings and conclusions set forth herein and on the record of the 
Confirmation Hearing constitute the Court&#146;s findings of fact and
conclusions of law pursuant to Bankruptcy Rule 7052, made applicable to this 
proceeding by Bankruptcy Rule&nbsp;9014.&#160; To the extent any of the 
following findings of fact constitute conclusions of law, they are adopted as 
such.&#160; To the extent any of the following conclusions of law constitute 
findings of fact, they are adopted as such.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">B.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Jurisdiction, Venue, Core Proceeding (28 U.S.C. 
&#167;&#167;&nbsp;157(b)(2)&nbsp;and 1334(a)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; The Court has jurisdiction over the Chapter 11 Cases pursuant to 
28&nbsp;U.S.C.&nbsp;&#167;&nbsp;1334.&#160; Confirmation of the Plan is a core 
proceeding pursuant to 28 U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;157(b), and the Court has 
jurisdiction to enter a Final Order determining that the Plan complies with the 
applicable provisions of the Bankruptcy Code and should be confirmed.&#160; 
Venue is proper before the Court pursuant to 28 U.S.C. 
&#167;&nbsp;1408.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">C.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Eligibility for Relief.</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; The Debtors are entities eligible for relief under section 109 of the 
Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">D.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Notice and Transmittal of Solicitation Materials; 
Adequacy of Solicitation Notices.</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">4.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; The Plan, the Disclosure Statement, the Disclosure Statement Order, the
ballots for voting on the Plan (the &#147;<u>Ballots</u>&#148;), the 
Confirmation Hearing Notice, the Plan Supplement, the D&amp;O Notices, and the 
other materials distributed by the Debtors in connection with Confirmation of 
the Plan (collectively, the &#147;<u>Confirmation Materials</u>&#148;) were 
transmitted and served in compliance with the Bankruptcy Rules, including
Bankruptcy Rules&nbsp;3017 and 3018, </font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">6<a name="PB_6_120759_3020"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\JMS\kgiri\16-16038-1\task8048152\16038-1-ks-
01.htm',USER='105348',CD='Aug  3 15:46 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">with the Local Bankruptcy Rules&nbsp;for the Southern 
District of New York (the &#147;<u>Local Rules</u>&#148;), and with the 
procedures set forth in the Disclosure Statement Order.&#160; Notice of the 
Confirmation Hearing was appropriate and satisfactory based upon the 
circumstances of the Debtors&#146; Chapter&nbsp;11 Cases.&#160; The transmittal 
and service of the Confirmation Materials complied with the approved 
Solicitation Procedures, was appropriate and satisfactory based upon the 
circumstances of the Chapter 11 Cases, was conducted in good faith, and was in 
compliance with the provisions of the Bankruptcy Code, the Bankruptcy Rules, the
Local Rules, and any other applicable rules, laws, and regulations.&#160; 
Because such transmittal and service were adequate and sufficient, no other or 
further notice is necessary or shall be required.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">E.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Voting.</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; On June&nbsp;6, 2016, the Notice and Claims Agent filed the Voting 
Certification with the Court.&#160; As evidenced by the Voting Certification, 
votes to accept or reject the Plan have been solicited and tabulated fairly, in 
good faith, and in a manner consistent with the Bankruptcy Code, the Bankruptcy 
Rules, the Solicitation Procedures, and the Local Rules.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">F.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Good Faith Solicitation (11 U.S.C. 
&#167;&nbsp;1125(e)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">6.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; Based on the record before the Court in the Chapter 11 Cases, the 
Debtors and their respective members, directors, officers, employees,
representatives, attorneys, financial advisors, investment bankers, agents, 
restructuring advisors, and other professionals have acted in &#147;good 
faith&#148; within the meaning of section 1125(e)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code 
and in compliance with the applicable provisions of the Solicitation Procedures,
the Bankruptcy Code, the Bankruptcy Rules, and the Local Rules&nbsp;in 
connection with all of their respective activities relating to the solicitation 
of acceptances to the Plan, their participation in the Chapter 11 Cases, and the
activities described in section 1125 of the Bankruptcy Code and therefore are 
entitled to the protections afforded by section 1125(e)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy 
Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">7<a name="PB_7_120817_7748"></a></p>

align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">G.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Plan Supplement.</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">7.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; The filing and notice of the Plan Supplement were proper and in 
accordance with the Plan, the Bankruptcy Code, the Bankruptcy Rules, and the 
Disclosure Statement Order, and no other or further notice is or shall be 
required.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">H.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Modifications to the Plan.</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">8.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; Pursuant to section 1127 of the Bankruptcy Code, any modifications to 
the Plan since the commencement of solicitation described or set forth herein 
constitute technical changes or changes with respect to particular Claims made 
pursuant to the agreement of the Holders of such Claims and do not materially or
adversely affect or change the treatment of any other Claims or Interests.&#160;
Pursuant to Bankruptcy Rule&nbsp;3019, these modifications do not require 
additional disclosure under section 1125 of the Bankruptcy Code or the 
resolicitation of votes under section 1126 of the Bankruptcy Code, nor do they 
require that the Holders of Claims or Interests be afforded an opportunity to 
change previously cast acceptances or rejections of the Plan.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">9.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#16
0;&#160; This Confirmation Order contains modifications to the Plan that were 
made to address objections and informal comments received from various parties-
in-interest.&#160; Modifications to the Plan since the entry of the Disclosure 
Statement Order, if any, are consistent with the provisions of the Bankruptcy 
Code.&#160; The disclosure of any Plan modifications prior to or on the record 
at the Confirmation Hearing constitutes due and sufficient notice of any and all
Plan modifications.&#160; The Plan as modified shall constitute the Plan 
submitted for Confirmation.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">I.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Objections.</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">10.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; To the 
extent that any objections, reservations of rights, statements, or joinders to 
Confirmation have not been resolved, withdrawn, waived, or settled prior to 
entry of this </font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">8<a name="PB_8_120838_141"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\JMS\kgiri\16-16038-1\task8048152\16038-1-ks-
01.htm',USER='105348',CD='Aug  3 15:46 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">Confirmation Order or otherwise resolved herein or as 
stated on the record of the Confirmation Hearing, they are hereby overruled on 
the merits based on the record before this Court.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">J.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Burden of Proof.</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">11.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The 
Debtors, as the proponents of the Plan, have met their burden of proving the 
elements of sections 1129(a)&nbsp;and (b)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code by a
preponderance of the evidence.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">K.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Bankruptcy Rule&nbsp;3016.</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">12.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Plan
is dated and identifies the Debtors as the Plan proponents, thereby satisfying 
Bankruptcy Rule&nbsp;3016(a).&#160; The filing of the Disclosure Statement 
satisfied Bankruptcy&nbsp;Rule&nbsp;3016(b).</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">L.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Plan Compliance with the Bankruptcy Code (11 U.S.C. 
&#167;&nbsp;1129(a)(1)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">13.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Plan
complies with the applicable provisions of the Bankruptcy Code, thereby 
satisfying section 1129(a)(1)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">a.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><u>Proper Classification (11 U.S.C. &#167;&#167; 1122, 1123(a)
(1))</u>.&#160; As required by section 1123(a)(1), in addition to Administrative
Claims (including Accrued Professional Compensation Claims) and&#160; Priority 
Tax Claims, which need not be classified, Article&nbsp;III of the Plan 
designates 11 Classes of Claims and Interests.&#160; As required by section 
1122(a)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code, the Claims and Interests placed in each 
Class&nbsp;are substantially similar to other Claims and Interests, as the case 
may be, in each such Class. &#160;Valid business, factual, and legal reasons 
exist for separately classifying the various Classes of Claims and Interests 
created under the Plan, and such Classes do not unfairly discriminate between 
Holders of Claims and Interests.&#160; Thus, the Plan satisfies sections 1122 
and 1123(a)(1)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">b.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><u>Specified Unimpaired Classes (11 U.S.C. &#167; 1123(a)(2))</u>.&#160;
Article&nbsp;III of the Plan specifies that Classes 1, 2, 9, and 10 are 
Unimpaired under the Plan, thereby satisfying section 1123(a)(2)&nbsp;of the 
Bankruptcy Code.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">c.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
; </font><u>Specified Treatment of Impaired Classes (11 U.S.C. 
&#167;&nbsp;1123(a)(3))</u>.&#160; Article&nbsp;III of the Plan sets forth the 
treatment of Classes 3-8 and 11, which are the Impaired Classes, thereby 
satisfying section 1123(a)(3)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">9<a name="PB_9_120856_7608"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\JMS\kgiri\16-16038-1\task8048152\16038-1-ks-
01.htm',USER='105348',CD='Aug  3 15:46 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">d.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><u>No Discrimination (11 U.S.C. &#167; 1123(a)(4))</u>.&#160; 
Article&nbsp;III of the Plan provides for the same treatment by the Debtors for 
each Claim or Interest in each respective Class&nbsp;except to the extent that a
Holder of a particular Claim or Interest has agreed to a less favorable 
treatment of such Claim or Interest, thereby satisfying section 1123(a)
(4)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">e.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
; </font><u>Implementation of the Plan (11 U.S.C. &#167; 1123(a)(5))</u>.&#160; 
The Plan and the various documents included in the Plan Supplement provide 
adequate and proper means for implementation of the Plan, including, without 
limitation:&#160; (i)&nbsp;the restructuring of the Debtors&#146; balance sheet 
and other financial transactions provided for by the Plan; (ii)&nbsp;the New 
Organizational Documents; (iii)&nbsp;the consummation of the Restructuring 
Transactions; (iv)&nbsp;the issuance of the New Common Stock and Warrants; 
(v)&nbsp;the cancellation of certain existing agreements, obligations, 
instruments, and Interests; (vi)&nbsp;the entry into the Exit Revolver Credit 
Facility and the New Second Lien Credit Facility; (vii)&nbsp;the continued 
vesting of the assets of the Debtors&#146; Estates in the Reorganized Debtors; 
and (viii)&nbsp;the execution, delivery, filing, or recording of all contracts, 
instruments, releases, and other agreements or documents in furtherance of the 
Plan, thereby satisfying section&nbsp;1123(a)(5)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy 
Code.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">f.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160; </font><u>Non-Voting Equity Securities (11 U.S.C. &#167; 1123(a)
(6))</u>.&#160; The New Organizational Documents prohibit the issuance of non-
voting securities and provide for an appropriate distribution of voting power if
additional classes of securities possessing such power are issued.&#160; As 
such, the Plan satisfies the requirements of section&nbsp;1123(a)(6)&nbsp;of the
Bankruptcy Code.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">g.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
; </font><u>Designation of Directors and Officers (11 U.S.C. &#167; 1123(a)
(7))</u>.&#160; The Reorganized Debtors&#146; and New Holdco&#146;s initial 
directors and officers, to the extent known, have been disclosed prior to the 
Confirmation Hearing and, to the extent not known, will be determined in 
accordance with the New Organizational Documents, which is consistent with the 
interests of creditors and equity holders and public policy and satisfies 
section 1123(a)(7)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">h.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><u>Additional Plan Provisions (11 U.S.C. &#167; 1123(b))</u>.&#160; The 
additional provisions of the Plan are appropriate and consistent with the 
applicable provisions of the Bankruptcy Code and, therefore, are consistent with
section 1123(b)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><u>Impairment/Unimpairment of Any Class&nbsp;of Claims or Interests (11 
U.S.C. &#167; 1123(b)(1))</u>.&#160; Pursuant to the Plan, Classes 1, 2, 9, and 
10 are Unimpaired, and Classes 3&#151;8 and 11 are Impaired, as contemplated by 
section 1123(b)(1)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Assumption and 
Rejection of Executory Contracts and Unexpired Leases (11 U.S.C. &#167; 1123(b)
(2))</u>.&#160; Article&nbsp;V of the Plan provides for the assumption and 
assignment of the Debtors&#146; Executory Contracts and Unexpired Leases to the
Reorganized Debtors as of the Effective Date</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">10<a name="PB_10_120913_8146"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='10',FILE='C:\JMS\kgiri\16-16038-1\task8048152\16038-1-ks-
01.htm',USER='105348',CD='Aug  3 15:46 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">unless such Executory Contract or Unexpired 
Lease:&#160; (A)&nbsp;was identified on the Schedule of Rejected Executory 
Contracts and Unexpired Leases, Supplemental Schedule of Rejected Executory 
Contracts, Second Supplemental Schedule of Rejected Executory Contracts; or 
Third Supplemental Schedule of Rejected Executory Contracts; (B)&nbsp;was 
previously rejected by a Final Order; (C)&nbsp;expired or terminated pursuant to
its own terms; (D)&nbsp;is the subject of a motion to reject Executory Contracts
or Unexpired Leases that is pending on the Confirmation Date; or (E)&nbsp;is 
subject to a motion to reject an Executory Contract or Unexpired Lease pursuant 
to which the requested effective date of such rejection is after the Effective 
Date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Retention of Claims (11 U.S.C. 
&#167; 1123(b)(3))</u>.&#160; In accordance with section 1123(b)(3)&nbsp;of the 
Bankruptcy Code, Article&nbsp;IV.K provides that, subject in all respects to 
Article&nbsp;VIII of the Plan and the terms of the Settlement, the Reorganized 
Debtors shall retain and may enforce all rights to commence and pursue, as 
appropriate, any and all Claims and Causes of Action other than the Released 
Claims and Settled Claims, whether arising before or after the Petition Date, 
including any actions specifically enumerated in the Plan Supplement, and the 
Reorganized Debtors&#146; rights to commence, prosecute, or settle such Causes 
of Action shall be preserved notwithstanding the occurrence of the Effective 
Date.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Other Appropriate Provisions (11 U.S.C. 
&#167; 1123(b)(6))</u>.&#160; The Plan&#146;s other provisions are appropriate 
and consistent with the applicable provisions of the Bankruptcy Code, including,
without limitation, provisions for (A)&nbsp;distributions to Holders of Claims 
and Interests, (B)&nbsp;resolution of Disputed Claims, (C)&nbsp;allowance of 
certain Claims, (D)&nbsp;the assumption of indemnification obligations owing to 
the RBL Agent, RBL Lenders, Second Lien Agent, Second Lien Lenders, and any 
individual who is serving or served as one of the Debtors&#146; directors, 
officers or employees on or after the Petition Date, (E)&nbsp;releases by the 
Debtors of certain parties, (F)&nbsp;releases by certain third parties, 
(G)&nbsp;exculpations of certain parties, and (H)&nbsp;retention of Court
jurisdiction, thereby satisfying the requirements of section 1123(b)(6).</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">i.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Cure of Defaults (11 U.S.C. &#167; 
1123(d))</u>.&#160; Article&nbsp;V.C of the Plan provides for the satisfaction 
of cure Claims associated with each Executory Contract and Unexpired Lease to be
assumed in accordance with section 365(b)(1)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.&#160; 
The cure amounts identified in the Notice to Contract and Lease Counterparties 
and any amendments thereto, as applicable, represent the amount, if any, that 
the Debtors shall pay in full and complete satisfaction of such cure 
Claims.&#160; Any disputed cure amounts will be determined in accordance with 
the procedures set forth in Article&nbsp;V.C of the Plan, and applicable 
bankruptcy and nonbankruptcy law.&#160; As such, the Plan provides that the 
Debtors will cure, or provide adequate assurance that the Debtors will promptly 
cure, defaults with respect to assumed Executory Contracts and Unexpired Leases 
in compliance </p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">11<a name="PB_11_121635_6317"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='11',FILE='C:\JMS\105039\16-16038-1\task8047770\16038-1-ks-
03.htm',USER='105039',CD='Aug  3 12:24 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" 
face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;"><a name="PB_1_121623_7091"></a><font 
size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">with section 365(b)
(1)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.&#160; Thus, the Plan complies with section 
1123(d)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">M.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-
weight:bold;">The Debtors&#146; Compliance with the Bankruptcy Code (11 U.S.C. 
&#167;&nbsp;1129(a)(2)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">14.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The 
Debtors have complied with the applicable provisions of the Bankruptcy Code, as 
required by section 1129(a)(2)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.&#160; 
Specifically:</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">a.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>the Debtors are eligible debtors under section 109 of the Bankruptcy Code
and are proper proponents of the Plan under section 1121(a)&nbsp;of the 
Bankruptcy Code;</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">b.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font>the Debtors have complied with applicable provisions of the Bankruptcy 
Code, except as otherwise provided or permitted by orders of the Bankruptcy 
Court; and</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">c.</font><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160
; </font>the Debtors have complied with the applicable provisions of the 
Bankruptcy Code, the Bankruptcy Rules, and the Local Rules&nbsp;in transmitting 
the Confirmation Materials and related notices and in soliciting and tabulating 
the votes on the Plan.</p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">N.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Payment for Services or Costs and Expenses (11 U.S.C. 
&#167;&nbsp;1129(a)(4)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">15.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Any 
payment made or to be made by the Debtors, or by a person issuing securities or 
acquiring property under the Plan, for services or for costs and expenses in 
connection with the Chapter 11 Cases, or in connection with the Plan and 
incident to the Chapter 11 Cases, has been approved by, or is subject to the 
approval of, the Court as reasonable, thereby satisfying section 1129(a)
(4)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">O.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Directors, Officers, and Insiders (11 U.S.C. 
&#167;&nbsp;1129(a)(5)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">16.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The
Debtors have complied with section 1129(a)(5)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.&#160;
To the extent not disclosed in the D&amp;O Notices, the identities of the 
Reorganized Debtors&#146; and New Holdco&#146;s directors and officers shall be 
determined in accordance with the New Organizational Documents.&#160; The 
identity and nature of compensation of any insiders to be retained or employed 
by the Reorganized Debtors were disclosed in the D&amp;O Notices.&#160; 
Accordingly, the Debtors have satisfied the requirements of section 1129(a)
(5)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">12<a name="PB_12_121719_455"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='12',FILE='C:\JMS\105039\16-16038-1\task8047770\16038-1-ks-
03.htm',USER='105039',CD='Aug  3 12:24 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">P.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
</font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">No Rate Changes (11 U.S.C. 
&#167;&nbsp;1129(a)(6)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">17.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
Section&nbsp;1129(a)(6)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code is satisfied because the 
Plan does not provide for any rate changes over which a governmental regulatory 
commission has jurisdiction.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Q.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Best Interests of Creditors (11 U.S.C. 
&#167;&nbsp;1129(a)(7)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">18.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Each 
Holder of an Impaired Claim or Interest either has accepted the Plan or will 
receive or retain under the Plan, on account of such Claim or Interest, property
of a value, as of the Effective Date, that is not less than the amount that such
Holder would receive or retain if the Debtors were liquidated under chapter 7 of
the Bankruptcy Code on such date.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">19.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The 
liquidation analysis attached as <b><u style="font-
weight:bold;">Exhibit&nbsp;E</u></b> to the Disclosure Statement 
(the&nbsp;&#147;<u>Liquidation Analysis</u>&#148;) and the other evidence 
related thereto in support of the Plan that was proffered or adduced at or prior
to the Confirmation Hearing or in the Confirmation Declarations:&#160; 
(a)&nbsp;are reasonable, persuasive, credible, and accurate as of the dates such
analyses or evidence was prepared, presented, or proffered; (b)&nbsp;utilize 
reasonable and appropriate methodologies and assumptions; (c)&nbsp;have not been
controverted by other evidence; and (d)&nbsp;establish that Holders of Allowed 
Claims in every Class&nbsp;will recover as much or more under the Plan on 
account of such Claim or Interest, as of the Effective Date, than the amount 
such Holder would receive if the Debtors were liquidated under chapter 7 of the 
Bankruptcy Code.&#160; Accordingly, the Plan satisfies the &#147;best interest 
of creditors&#148; test under section 1129(a)(7)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy 
Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">R.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Acceptance by Certain Classes (11 U.S.C. 
&#167;&nbsp;1129(a)(8)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">20.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Classes 
1, 2, 9, and 10 are Unimpaired by the Plan pursuant to section 1124 of the 
Bankruptcy Code and, accordingly, Holders of Claims or Interests in such Classes
are conclusively deemed to have accepted the Plan pursuant to section 
1126(f)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.&#160; Classes 3&#150;7 are Impaired by the 
Plan.&#160; Classes 3, 4b, 6a, 6b, 6c, 6d, 6e, 6f, 6g, 6h, 6i, 6j, </font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">13<a name="PB_13_121747_4141"></a></p>
<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade 
align="left" style="color:#010101;"></div>
</div>

03.htm',USER='105039',CD='Aug  3 12:24 2016' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">7b, and 7e have voted to accept the Plan and Classes 
5a, 5b, and 5c have voted to reject the Plan, as established by the Voting 
Certification.&#160; Holders of Claims or Interests in Classes 8 and 11 will not
receive or retain any property on account of their Claims or Interests and, 
accordingly, such Claims and Interests are Impaired and such Holders are deemed 
to have rejected the Plan pursuant to section 1126(g)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy 
Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">S.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</font><b><u style="font-weight:bold;">Treatment of Administrative Claims, 
Priority Tax Claims, Secured Tax Claims, and Priority Non-Tax Claims (11 U.S.C. 
&#167;&nbsp;1129(a)(9)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">21.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The 
treatment of Administrative Claims, Priority Tax Claims, Secured Tax Claims, and
Priority Non-Tax Claims pursuant to Article&nbsp;II of the Plan satisfies the 
requirements of section 1129(a)(9)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.&#160; 
Accordingly, the Debtors have satisfied the requirements of section 1129(a)
(9)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">T.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Acceptance By at Least One Impaired Class&nbsp;of 
Claims (11 U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;1129(a)(10)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">22.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Claims 
in Classes 3&#150;7 are entitled to vote under the Plan.&#160; 3, 4b, 6a, 6b, 
6c, 6d, 6e, 6f, 6g, 6h, 6i, 6j, 7b, and 7e have voted to accept the Plan, as 
established by the Voting Certification.&#160; Accordingly, the Plan satisfies 
section 1129(a)(10)&nbsp;of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">U.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Feasibility (11 U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;1129(a)
(11)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">23.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The 
evidence proffered or adduced at the Confirmation Hearing and set forth in 
Confirmation Declarations (a)&nbsp;is reasonable, persuasive, and credible, 
(b)&nbsp;has not been controverted by other evidence, (c)&nbsp;utilizes 
reasonable and appropriate methodologies and assumptions, and 
(d)&nbsp;establishes that the Plan is feasible and that there is a reasonable 
prospect of the Reorganized Debtors being able to meet their financial 
obligations under the Plan and in the ordinary course of their business, and 
that confirmation of the Plan is not likely to be followed by the liquidation or
the need for further financial reorganization of the Reorganized Debtors.&#160; 
Therefore, the Plan satisfies the requirements of section 1129(a)(11) of the 
Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">14<a name="PB_14_121815_8627"></a></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">V.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">Payment of Fees (11 U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;1129(a)
(12)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">24.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; As set 
forth in Article&nbsp;II.D of the Plan, all fees payable pursuant to section 
1930 of title 28 of the United States Code, and any interest thereon pursuant to
section 3717 of title 31 of the United States Code, due and payable through the 
Effective Date shall be paid by the Debtors on or before the Effective Date and 
amounts due thereafter shall be paid by the Reorganized Debtors in the ordinary 
course of business until the Court enters a final decree closing the 
Debtors&#146; Chapter 11 Cases, dismisses the Chapter 11 Cases, or converts the 
Chapter 11 Cases to a case under Chapter 7 of the Bankruptcy Code.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">W.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u style="font-
weight:bold;">Retiree Benefits (11 U.S.C. &#167;&nbsp;1129(a)(13)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">25.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 
Section&nbsp;1129(a)(13) of the Bankruptcy Code requires a plan to provide for 
&#147;retiree benefits&#148; (as defined in section 1114 of the Bankruptcy Code)
at levels established pursuant to section 1114 of the Bankruptcy Code.&#160; 
Article&nbsp;IV.N of the Plan provides that, on and after the Effective Date, 
all retiree benefits shall remain in place and will continued to be 
honored.&#160; Accordingly, the requirements of section 1129(a)(13) of the 
Bankruptcy Code have been satisfied.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">X.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">No Domestic Support Obligations (11 U.S.C. &#167; 
1129(a)(14)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">26.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The 
Debtors are not required by a judicial or administrative order, or by statute, 
to pay a domestic support obligation.&#160; Accordingly, section 1129(a)(14) of 
the Bankruptcy Code is inapplicable in the Chapter 11 Cases.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-
indent:-.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Y.</font></b><font size="1" style="font-
size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&
#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#1
60;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><b><u 
style="font-weight:bold;">None of the Debtors is an Individual (11 U.S.C. &#167;
1129(a)(15)).</u></b></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times 
New Roman" style="font-
size:10.0pt;">27.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; None of 
the Debtors is an individual.&#160; Accordingly, section 1129(a)(15) of the 
Bankruptcy Code is inapplicable in the Chapter 11 Cases.</font></p>
<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" 
style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-
align:center;">15<a name="PB_15_121823_7906"></a></p>
